They brainwash the students\nwith Communist ideology.&nbsp;</span> After that they\nwatch the students who belong to the Communist Students Union .<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> Students who\npropagate the Communist ideology are sponsored </span>!\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; It will inevitably raise\nthe thought in the minds of many that an order within which the activities of a\nperson like Dr. Sen can be held to be \u201cseditious\u201d is not worth defending.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Such an impression must\nbe avoided. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZLoQODQW5Rg/Vr3-lkpYdjI/AAAAAAABD8o/HP8yAtIqtuE/s1600/l2004121DD001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"438\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZLoQODQW5Rg/Vr3-lkpYdjI/AAAAAAABD8o/HP8yAtIqtuE/s640/l2004121DD001.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO need for\nWikipedia to lie<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Dange in Moscow[edit]<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">On the day India got\nfreedom, 15 August 1947 Dange was in Moscow talking to the Soviet leaders.\nAndrei Zhdanov and Mikhail Suslov, leading Soviet theorists of the period,\nparticipated in the 1947 talks with Dange.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The following free and\nfrank exchange between Dange and Zhdanov on the day after the India's\nIndependence day, that is, on 16 August 1947, brings out the chaotic situation\nin which the Communist Party of India found itself at that historical juncture:<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Further com. Zhdanov\nasks com. Dange to explain why the Congress managed to strengthen its\nauthority.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Comrade Dange opines\nthat during the war the Congress, taking into account the anti-English\nsentiments of the wide masses, opposed the English and by this action acquired\na semblance of a national organisation fighting for the national sovereignty.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The Communist Party\nduring the war supported the allies, including the English and by this action\nweakened its influence as a lot of people could not correctly understand the\nposition of the Party. A considerable part of the supporters of the Communist\nParty during the war shifted to the Congress.[24]<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">The Soviet leaders\nclosely questioned Dange about the Congress. For years questions regarding what\nattitude should be taken toward the Congress would be debated inside the left\nparties in India. The following portion shows Dange's attitude towards the\nCongress and Muslim League, at that time.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Com. Zhdanov: What is\nNehru \u2013 a capitalist or a landowner?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Com. Dange: A\nbourgeois.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Com. Zhdanov: And\nJinnah?<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Com. Dange: Also a\nbourgeois. He is an eminent advocate, has acquired a lot of money and has\ninvested it in enterprises. Nehru also belongs to a family of eminent advocates\nand has invested his substantial savings in the Indian company of Tata....\n.[24] UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BELOW IS AN ATTEMPT TO TAKE OVER INDIA BY A VIOLENT REVOLUTION -- &nbsp; EVERYTHING WAS READY -- &nbsp; SLEEPER CELLS WERE ACTIVATED - JEW STALIN VETOED IT AT THE LAST MOMENT .&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WIKIPEDIA HAS JUST LIFTED THE PASSAGE BELOW FROM MY BLOGSITE &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<blockquote style=\"background-color: white; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 1em 0px; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px 40px;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: inherit; margin-bottom: 0.5em; margin-top: 0.5em;\">\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\">QUOTE: &nbsp;Four leaders, two from each center, were brought to Moscow. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Today atleast\nPakistanis know that Malala Yousafzai is a JEWESS and all of them HATE this\nNobel Prize winner..<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">The Lyngdoh Committee was set up by the Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD) in 2006 as per the direction of the Supreme Court to reform students' union elections and to get rid of money and muscle power in student politics.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Former Chief Election Commissioner, Mr J.M. Lyngdoh had, in his report, suggested sweeping reforms to keep off the influence of political parties, foreign money and muscle power from campus during student union elections&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">There shall be no appeal to caste or communal feelings for securing votes. Places of worship, within or outside the campus, shall not be used for the election propaganda,\u201d the report said, while prohibiting use of printed posters, pamphlets or any other election material as only handmade posters would be permitted.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Only those students, who had attained minimum permissible percentage of attendance as prescribed in a college or university, or 75 per cent where it had not been prescribed, would be eligible to vote.</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;We are living in an age of spin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1921, the famous\nAmerican journalist Walter Lippmann said that the art of democracy requires\nwhat he called the \u201cmanufacture of consent.\u201d&nbsp;\nT&nbsp; his phrase is an Orwellian\neuphemism for thought control.&nbsp; The idea\nis that in a state , where the government can\u2019t control the people by force, it\nhad better control what they think.&nbsp; Here is the noted Malayalam/Tamil writer B.Jeyamohan`s words:</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">http://www.twitlonger.com/show/n_1so3tg2</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">\"\u201d IIC is located in a peaceful and luxurious bungalow with lawns, high class food and drinks, quietly moving waiters, the butter English spoken without the upper lip moving, lipsticked women gracefully adjusting their hair, the elegant welcome given to the inner circle members with signs and hugs without making any noise!</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">I have stayed in many star hotels later. But I have never seen anywhere the luxury and comfort of IIC.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">IIC was established and funded by the Indian government as an independent body to promote arts and \u201cfree thinking\u201d. If my memory serves me right, Dr. Karan Singh was also its head. I saw him in that evening.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">I saw every intellectual that I had known through my reading of English language magazines. U R Ananthamurthy was staying there for almost four years almost as a permanent fixture. Girish Karnad was staying for a few days. Writers, journalists and thinkers such as Pritish Nandi, Makarant Parajpe, Shobha De were seen everywhere in the Centre.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">It was true that I was overwhelmed that day. Arunmozhi (my wife) ran to Girish Karnad on spotting him and was thrilled to introduce herself to him. I was told that Nayantara Sehgal used to come there on daily basis to have a drink. I saw her that day too. I realized that the two other individuals who were given the award along with me, Rajdeep Sardesai and Anamika Haksar were regulars there.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">They wear rough Kolkata kurtas and Kolhapuri chappals. Wear small glasses. Women in pure white hair and khadi saris. One of them, they said, was Kapila Vatsyayan. They said, Pupul Jayakar will also come. Wherever you turn, there were literary talks and art discussions.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">But now, for the first time in the history of independent India someone has dared to touch this power circle. Warnings were circulated at the lower level for the last about 6 months. Last week the Culture Ministry decided to send a notice to them. This, perhaps, is the reason for these intellectuals to suddenly flare up against \u201cintolerance\u201d.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Even for a man as strong Modi, I think he has touched a wrong nerve. These elements are too powerful. They can destroy India through the media worldwide. They can create a picture that rivers of blood are flowing in India. They can make businessmen around the world to halt. They can wreck the tourism industry. The truth is there is no other power centre like this in India. Tolerating them is unavoidable for India. And Modi\u2019s intolerance of them is extremely dangerous \u2013 not only for him but for the country itself. \"</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">And it is truly frightening to say the least. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; On 21 July 2014, Press Council of India\nChairman and former Supreme Court judge Justice Markandey Katju made\nallegations of corruption in the judiciary. Katju alleged that a District Judge\nin Tamil Nadu, later revealed to be Justice S. Ashok Kumar, was elevated to the\nposition of Additional Judge of the Madras High Court despite charges of\ncorruption against him. Katju alleged that the judge had been directly appointed\nas a District Judge in Tamil Nadu and during his career as district judge,\nthere were as many as eight adverse entries against him recorded by various\nportfolio judges of the Madras High Court. Katju has alleged that one acting\nChief Justice of the Madras High Court deleted all those adverse entries and\nconsequently S. Ashok Kumar became an Additional Judge of the High Court. He\nhas said that the judge had the solid support of a very important political\nleader of Tamil Nadu. [10][11] [12] He again proved his mettle while dealing\nwith a case in which 78-year-old former Chief Minister (as he then was) Mr. M.\nKarunanidhi was arrested at midnight by the police at later produced before\nAshok Kumar around 4:30 a.m. and was remanded to judicial custody. As a judge\nhe was annoyed that the police did not heed his specific directive that Mr.\nKarunanidhi should be first medically examined at the Government General\nHospital, Chennai, before being taken to the prison and he said \"the whole\nworld has seen Karunanidhi sitting like a beggar before the central prison,\nbegging for medical treatment.\"[13] He famously asked the police, \"a\n78-year old man suffering from various ailments. Is your heart made of muscle\nor mud? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobbyists\nare no longer in the shadows, they have become public figures, dining and\nwining and rubbing shoulders with the powers-that-be.&nbsp; They get invites to Western embassy Christmas\ncocktails and dinners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protecting\ninvestment climate has become a ploy for dishing out selective and holy cow\ntreatment to rich corporates that might be detrimental to India's national\ninterest and security.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can\nyou imagine\u2014 even Mother Teresa lobbied vigorously for UCC chairman Anderson .&nbsp; Dow has paid for UC liabilities in the US\u2014but\nnot in India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under\nthe rule of Narendra Modi , India will overtake USA as world\u2019s No 1 superpower\nin 17 years.&nbsp; We are a RICH nation with a\ncritical and strategic landmass , populated with intelligent people , where ALL\ncompanies want to invest money.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We\nhave to deal with foreign corporations from a point of strength.&nbsp; There is NO need to attract investment by\nscuttling the nation.&nbsp; Of course,\nbusiness and entrepreneurship is good for India and the government should help\nthe business community-- but NOT at the expense of going back to slavery by\nbecoming a banana republic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nmulti-nationals can come to India to do business. We Indians will NOT allow\nthem to \"lobby\"&nbsp; ( buy our\nminsters) and rule our country by remote control , and siphon off our nation's\nwealth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do\nwe allow all these foreign funded TV channels to dole out annual awards&nbsp; like faalthu film magazines ? &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;These are sham awards for quid pro quo\ndeals.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently the Election Commission\nwas given an award \" Indian of the year\" by Prannoy Roy of NDTV in the thick of elections, as soon as an FIR was lodged against Modi for a selfie outside the polling booth after voting .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Are there no\nchecks and stoppers ?&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bribery\nin bureaucracy is the reason for the higher cost of production of goods and\nservices. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many\ntypes of bribes exist: tip, gift, sop, perk, skim, favor, discount, waived\nfee/ticket, free food, free ad, free trip, free tickets, &nbsp;waived loan, sweetheart deal, kickback,\nfunding, inflated sale of an object or property, lucrative contract, donation,\ncampaign contribution, fundraiser, sponsorship/backing, higher paying job,\nstock options, secret commission, or promotion (rise of rank), scholarship for\nchildren in western university etc .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NGOs\nARE DEEPLY INVLOVED IN CULTURAL TERRORIM AND HEGELIAN DIALECTIC and FALSE FLAG\nATTACKS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: windowtext; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/cultural-terrorism-by-benami-media-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/cultural-terrorism-by-benami-media-and.html</a></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html\"><span style=\"color: windowtext; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/hegelian-dialectic-cancer-on-this.html</span></a></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My\nNorth Indian friends only son was mentally challenged. &nbsp;&nbsp;After nearly 2.5 decades I bumped into him,\nand my first question was \" &nbsp;&nbsp;Do you\nhave any more children?\" &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He says\nhappily \" &nbsp;&nbsp;No!. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;But my&nbsp;\nsemi-retarded son is now heading a foreign funded NGO and he goes around\nin a chauffeur driven BMW!\"&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So ,\nin the past , politics was the last refuge of a scoundrel with no brains. Now\nheading an NGO is the last resort-- you can roll in hundreds of crores.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- and\nthen he proceeded to tell me ( being a close friend ) that most NGOs' are a\nmere cover , to make money without paying tax.&nbsp;\nHe even told me that some religious NGOs's were into Hawala money\nlaundering and foreign drug trade.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nquarter century ago, I had a Tamilian third mate. One day while I was sitting\non the Pilot''s chair in his sea watch doing some idle gossip with him, he told\nof a bizarre incident. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was\nwalking through the busting Mount Road Street of Chennai , when suddenly a\nfamiliar voice called out his name. He was pleasantly surprised to see one of\nhis \"langot yaar\" buddies , his class mate and best friend as a small\nchild.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both\nof them had dinner and drinks together, and then his friend took him to his\nflat nearby. He had to while away some time, as the last launch service to ship\nwas late at night.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His\nfriend had showed him a card , which indicated that he was he worked for an\nChennai NGO funded from Europe. He had even converted and become Christian with\na new angrezi name .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To his\nsurprise, there was NO furniture in the flat. It was empty-- just a large\nbackpack in a corner, and another huge sling on airbag. On the floor was a\ninflatable pillow and a sheet--that was it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His\nfriend confessed that he is now an LTTE cadre, quite close to Prabkakaran.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then\nhe took out an AK47 machine gun out of this bag, assembled it and allowed my\nthird mate to play with it.&nbsp; &nbsp;In between he\ntold him \" If you want to kill somebody show him to me and I will do it\n\" .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many\nNGOs' are involved in funding the terror activities of Naxalites, ULFA , and\nthe Muslim organisations?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No\nbenami media says a single world in support of the uprooted Kashmiri Pandits or\nethnic cleansing of Hindus in Pakistan / Bangladesh \u2013 all were driven away at gunpoint\nand their lands grabbed&nbsp; . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One\nBabri Masjid created so much HOO HAA on benami media . Thousands of Hindu\ntemples destroyed in Kashrmir/ Pakistan / Bangladesh has created no waves !</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DELHI\nCM FIGHT BETWEEN TWO MAGSAYSAY AWARD WINNERS-BOTH RUNING FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Was this\nan accident and by serendipity ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">When\nan NGO does not have to pay tax, then it is a magnet for money launderers.</b>&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Black money means , no tax is paid on it. &nbsp; This is what FII money is--foreign\ninstitutional investor money. &nbsp;&nbsp;Hawala\nmoney is brought back from offshore this way.&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; It has to be understood&nbsp;&nbsp; primarily in terms of propaganda. Violence\nand propaganda, however, have much&nbsp;&nbsp; in\ncommon. Violence aims at behaviour modification by coercion. Propaganda\naims&nbsp;&nbsp; at the same by persuasion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Terrorism\ncan be seen as a combination of the two.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nTerrorism, by using violence against one victim, seeks to coerce and\npersuade<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The US\nEmbassy in Islamabad was responsible for sponsoring Pakistan's first ever gay,\nlesbian, bisexual and transgender pride celebration on June 26&nbsp; 2011&nbsp; . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; Supporting China in Sino-Indian War[edit]<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">During the Sino-Indian\nWar,official policy of Communists was to support the Chinese Government, while\nfew sections of the party revolted against this stand.[29] There were three\nfactions in the party \u2013 \"internationalists\", \"centrists\",\nand \"nationalists\".[citation needed] \"Internationalists\",\nincluding B. T. Ranadive, P. Sundarayya, P. C. Joshi, Makineni Basavapunnaiah,\nJyoti Basu, and Harkishan Singh Surjeet, supported the Chinese stand. The\n\"nationalists\", including prominent leaders such as S.A. Dange, A. K.\nGopalan[citation needed] backed India. \"Centrists\" took a neutral\nview; Ajoy Ghosh was the prominent person in the centrist faction. In general,\nmost of Bengal Communist leaders supported China and most others supported\nIndia.[30][verification needed] </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Hundreds of CPI leaders, accused of being\npro-Chinese, were imprisoned. Some of the nationalists were also imprisoned, as\nthey used to express their opinion only in party forums, and CPI's official\nstand was pro-China. </span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">UNQUOTE </span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; The basis of difference in opinion between\nthe two factions in CPI was ideological \u2013 about the assessment of Indian\nscenario and the development of a party programme. This difference in opinion\nwas also a reflection of a similar difference at international level on\nideology between the Soviet and Chinese parties. The alleged 'right wing'\ninside the party followed the Soviet path and put forward the idea of joining\nhands with the then ruling party \u2013 Indian National Congress. Whereas the faction\nof CPI which later became CPI(M) referred to this as a revisionist approach of\nclass collaboration. ISRAEL IS THE ONLY NATION WHERE ELECTED LEADERS PLEDGE TO SERVE THE WATAN.<br />\n<br />\nLAND IS REAL - THIS IS YOUR MOTHER<br />\n<br />\nYOU CAN BE PATRIOTIC TO THE LAND --HOW CAN YOU BE PATRIOTIC TO A BOOK?<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD DECLARED<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> \u201cPATRIOTS ARE SCOUNDRELS \u201c</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU ARE PATRIOTIC TO \"IDEOLOGIES \" ( RIDICULOUS ) IS IS POSSIBLE FOR A BROWN SKINNED INDIAN COMMIE TO ALLY WITH A YELLOW SKINNED SLIT EYED COMMIE CHINESE OR A WHITE SKINNED COMMIE RUSSIAN.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SEE COMMIE IDEOLOGY IS THE MOTHER FOR THEM.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nJNU COMMIE TEACHERS BRAINWASH THEIR STUDENTS . THEY ARE TAUGHT TO BE COMRADES AND CRY OUT <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">LIBERTY EQUALITY FRATERNITY </span></b>AND DERIDE THEIR WATAN .<br />\nTHIS SLOGAN WAS CREATED BY ROTHSCHILD FOR THE FRENCH REVOLUTION.<br />\nWHY DO COMMIES KILL ENMASSE BY BLOODBATH ?<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN COMMIES TRIED TO DO A BOLSHEVIK TYPE REVOLUTION IN 1951 WITH JEW STALINs HELP AND ANOTHER REVOLUTION IN 1961 WITH JEW MAOs HELP.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS IS BECAUSE THEY ARE LOYAL TO A FAKE COMMIE IDEOLOGY ( CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ) NOT THE WATAN ( LAND )</span></b><br />\nI KNOW MORE ABOUT COMMUNISM THAN ALL INDIAN COMMIE LEADERS COMBINED AND THEN MULTIPLIED BY 100.<br />\n<br />\nTHESE INDIAN COMMIES THINK THAT BY BEING ABLE TO PRONOUNCE THE WORLD <b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BOURGEOIS</span></b> PROPERLY , THEN YOU BECOME A COMRADE.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN SA DANGE DESCRIBED NEHRU AS BOURGEOIS , IN MOSCOW JEW STALIN LAUGHED LOUDLY .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WAS THE FIRST TIME HIS VOICE WAS HERD IN 1951 WHEN 4 INDIAN COMMIES WENT TO MOSCOW ON A RUSSIAN SHIP AS STOWAWAYS FROM CALCUTTA KIDDERPORE DOCKS --TO TAKE PERMISSION FOR A BLOODBATH REVOLUTION IN INDIA .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_170MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_170BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 27, 2014 at 7:52 PM<br />\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nI WONDER WHY THERE WERE NO COMMENTS IN THE TOI POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nMAY BE I SHOULD MAKE ONE.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/home/stoi/A-fine-family/articleshow/1666348111.cms<br />\n<br />\nIK Gujral\u2019s sister was Niti Judge . Their son Amit Judge was Chairman of Turner Morrison .<br />\n<br />\nAmit Judge, the founder of Barista, is IK Gujral's nephew and was married to Late Nandita Jain, TOI Ashok Jain's daughter.<br />\n<br />\nAshok Jain was the Chairman of India's largest media group, Bennett, Coleman &amp; Co. Ltd., parent company of The Times of India.<br />\n<br />\nAskok Jain was married to Indu Jain by whom he had two sons, Samir Jain, Vineet Jain and a daughter Nandita.<br />\n<br />\nVineet Jain\u2019s wife was IK Gujral's niece.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">Bharat Ratna Atal Bihari Vajpayee accusing Prime Minister I.K. Gujral of shielding Askok Jain because, as Vajpayee said, \"Jain is his relative\".&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\nThe FERA case related to a 24-year-old dispute between Jain and N.S. Hoon, an NRI businessman, over control of Turner Morrison, a R controlled British-owned holding company. Hoon alleged Jain had illegally grabbed the company and violated FERA provisions in the process.<br />\n<br />\nIK Gujral was a R commie in his young days .<br />\n<br />\nDuring the emergency of June 1975, Gujral was Minister of Information and Broadcasting, where he was in charge of the media during a time of censorship in India and was in charge of Doordarshan. He served as Minister of External Affairs in Prime Minister V. P. Singh's cabinet. The United Front elected Gujral as their new leader and he was sworn in as Prime Minister on 21 April 1997.<br />\n<br />\nAmit Judge\u2019s Judge\u2019s sister is married to Vineet Jain, MD Times Group who is Nandita Jain\u2019s brother.<br />\n<br />\nAshok Jain \u2018s father Sahu Shanti Prasad Jain was a business partner of R .<br />\n<br />\nSahu Shanti Prasad Jain\u2019s father-in-law Ra mkrishna D@lmia was a Opium agent of R. In 1947, he engineered the acquisition of the media giant Bennett, Coleman by transferring monies from a bank and an insurance company of which he was the Chairman.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1955, Indira\u2019s husband Feroze Gandhi raised the matter in Parliament, documenting extensively the various fund transfers and intermediaries through which the acquisition had been financed. The case was investigated by the Vivian Bose Commission of Inquiry.<span style=\"color: blue;\"> RK Dalmia had 6 wives and 18 children</span><br />\n<br />\nIn the court case that followed, where he was represented by the leading British attorney Sir Dingle Mackintosh Foot,<span style=\"color: blue;\"> our man with 18 children was sentenced to two years in Tihar Jail.</span><br />\n<br />\nFine R family never went to jail !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayiil<br />\n..<br />\n#######################################<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/12/grit-in-your-perception-apparatus.html<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_183M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'times new roman', times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-weight: bold; line-height: 23.4px; margin-bottom: 10px;\">\nArticle 19(2) in The Constitution Of India 1949</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"></b></span><br /></div>\n<div class=\"section\" id=\"19_2\" style=\"font-family: georgia, sans-serif; font-size: 15.6px; line-height: 23.4px; margin-left: 10px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n(2) Nothing in sub clause (a) of clause ( 1 ) shall affect the operation of any existing law, or prevent the State from making any law, in so far as such law imposes reasonable restrictions on the exercise of the right conferred by the said sub clause in the interests of the <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>sovereignty and integrity of India, the security of the State, (<span style=\"color: red;\">WATAN</span> )</b></span> friendly relations with foreign States, public order, decency or morality or in relation to contempt of court, defamation or incitement to an offence</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"doc_title\" style=\"font-family: georgia, sans-serif; font-size: 1.1em; font-weight: bold; line-height: 23.4px; margin-bottom: 10px;\">\nArticle 19(1) in The Constitution Of India 1949</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"></b></span><br /></div>\n<div class=\"section\" id=\"19_1\" style=\"font-family: georgia, sans-serif; line-height: 23.4px; margin-left: 10px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 15.6px;\">\n(1) All citizens shall have the right</div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_a\" style=\"font-size: 15.6px; margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<a href=\"http://indiankanoon.org/doc/1378441/\" style=\"color: #1100cc;\">(a)</a>&nbsp;to freedom of speech and expression;</div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_b\" style=\"font-size: 15.6px; margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<a href=\"http://indiankanoon.org/doc/1248826/\" style=\"color: #1100cc;\">(b)</a>&nbsp;to assemble peaceably and without arms;</div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_c\" style=\"font-size: 15.6px; margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<a href=\"http://indiankanoon.org/doc/445304/\" style=\"color: #1100cc;\">(c)</a>&nbsp;to form associations or unions;</div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_d\" style=\"font-size: 15.6px; margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<a href=\"http://indiankanoon.org/doc/1024002/\" style=\"color: #1100cc;\">(d)</a>&nbsp;to move freely throughout the territory of India;</div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_e\" style=\"font-size: 15.6px; margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<a href=\"http://indiankanoon.org/doc/844404/\" style=\"color: #1100cc;\">(e)</a>&nbsp;to reside and settle in any part of the territory of India; and</div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_f\" style=\"font-size: 15.6px; margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<a href=\"http://indiankanoon.org/doc/258019/\" style=\"color: #1100cc;\">(f)</a>&nbsp;omitted</div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_g\" style=\"font-size: 15.6px; margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<a href=\"http://indiankanoon.org/doc/935769/\" style=\"color: #1100cc;\">(g)</a>&nbsp;to practise any profession, or to carry on any occupation, trade or business<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Seema Chisti , wife of Sitaram Yechury ( Ex-BBC ) and resident editor of Indian Express.</b></div>\n<div class=\"subsection\" id=\"19_1_g\" style=\"margin-left: 20px; padding: 5px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 15.6px; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AJgWzSwL3gw/VsH7E3R6gkI/AAAAAAABEHs/qMIjVjcPcFE/s1600/M_Id_2280ddd76_FP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xwVfoSEViXU/VsH9Om2YnMI/AAAAAAABEII/Q1iSG8aNdFI/s1600/ima89ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"286\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xwVfoSEViXU/VsH9Om2YnMI/AAAAAAABEII/Q1iSG8aNdFI/s400/ima89ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">TIME TO BREAK A BOMBSHELL-</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">ALL THIS EVEN AJIT DOVAL WILL NOT KNOW .</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WHEN ZAIL SINGH WAS PRESIDENT, VISITORS REGISTERS WERE NOT FILLED BY KHALISTANIS FROM ABROAD .</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">I KNOW THE EXACT SUPER LOUD SLOGAN HOLLERING WENT ON IN THE DINING ROOM OF RASHTRAPATI BHAVAN ( SOURCE GOAN STEWARDS BROTHER ) . &nbsp;IT IS A TOTAL DISGRACE-</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">RAAJ KAREEGA KHALSA,-- AND THEN UNPRINTABLE ONES ABOUT BHARATMATA, WITH ZAIL SINGH SMILING IN GLEE &nbsp;!</b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHEN JEW GEN JFR JACOB WAS GOVERNOR OF GOA &nbsp;, THE VISITORS REGISTER WAS NOT FILLED WHEN WHITE JEWS VISITED-- &nbsp;HERE THERE WAS ONLY CLOSED DOORS HUSH HUSH MEETINGS .</b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">\n<div style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">MY REVELATION PERCENTAGE HAS JUMPED TO 14.55%.</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"post-header\" style=\"background-color: white; border-bottom-color: rgb(238, 238, 238); border-bottom-style: double; border-bottom-width: 4px; color: #333333; font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 10px; line-height: 22px; padding-bottom: 7px;\">\n<h1 style=\"font-size: 2.6em; line-height: 1.1em; margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nSOLIDARITY STATEMENT BY JNU ALUMNI AND INTERNATIONAL ACADEMIC&nbsp;COMMUNITY</h1>\n<div class=\"date\" id=\"single-date\" style=\"color: #757575; font-family: 'Trebuchet MS', 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans', Verdana, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 1.6em; padding-top: 10px; text-transform: uppercase;\">\nFEBRUARY 15, 2016</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"meta clear\" style=\"background-color: white; color: #666666; font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 22px; margin: 10px 0px 20px;\">\n<div class=\"tags\" style=\"float: right; font-style: italic; text-align: right; width: 400px;\">\ntags:&nbsp;<a href=\"http://kafila.org/tag/9-february-2016/\" rel=\"tag\" style=\"color: #666666; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">9 February 2016</a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"http://kafila.org/tag/freedom-of-expression/\" rel=\"tag\" style=\"color: #666666; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">freedom of expression</a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"http://kafila.org/tag/jawaharlal-nehru-university/\" rel=\"tag\" style=\"color: #666666; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">Jawaharlal Nehru University</a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"http://kafila.org/tag/jnu/\" rel=\"tag\" style=\"color: #666666; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">JNU</a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"http://kafila.org/tag/kanhaiya-kumar/\" rel=\"tag\" style=\"color: #666666; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">Kanhaiya Kumar</a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"http://kafila.org/tag/police-action/\" rel=\"tag\" style=\"color: #666666; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">police action</a>,&nbsp;<a href=\"http://kafila.org/tag/sedition/\" rel=\"tag\" style=\"color: #666666; font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">sedition</a></div>\n<div class=\"author\">\n<span class=\"by-author\"><span class=\"sep\">by</span>&nbsp;<span class=\"author vcard\"><a class=\"url fn n\" href=\"http://kafila.org/author/aaroti/\" rel=\"author\" style=\"color: #666666; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"View all posts by Aarti Sethi\">Aarti Sethi</a></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br /></div>\n<div class=\"entry clear\" style=\"color: #333333; font-family: georgia, 'times new roman', times, serif; font-size: 1.3em; line-height: 22px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\nThe statement below represents the concerns of JNU\u2019s international alumni, and a wider global academic community of friends and comrades. The support demonstrated by the names below testifies that JNU is far more than a besieged university campus in India. JNU stands for a vital imagination of the space of the university \u2013 an imagination that embraces critical thinking, democratic dissent, student activism, and the plurality of political beliefs. It is this critical imagination that the current establishment seeks to destroy. And we know that this is not a problem for India alone. Similar attacks on critical dissent and university spaces are being attempted and resisted across the world.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\nIf you would like to stand in solidarity with the students and faculty of JNU, and the ethos of university spaces everywhere, please mention your name and current institutional affiliation in the \u2018Comments\u2019 section. Also, in case you are a JNU alumnus, please mention the year you graduated. This list will be regularly updated.</div>\n<blockquote style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: url(&quot;/wp-content/themes/pub/vigilance/images/blockquote.gif&quot;); background-origin: initial; background-position: 0% 0%; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: initial; color: #141310; font-size: 14px; font-style: italic; margin: 20px 0px; padding: 20px 20px 10px 45px;\">\n<div style=\"background-color: #e7e6e2; font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\">\n****SOLIDARITY STATEMENT****</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>We, the undersigned, stand in solidarity with the students, faculty and staff of Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi against the illegal ongoing police action since February 9, 2016. </b></span><span style=\"background-color: #e7e6e2;\">With them, we affirm the autonomy of the university as a non-militarized space for freedom of thought and expression. Accordingly, we condemn police presence on campus and the harassment of students on the basis of their political beliefs.</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #e7e6e2; font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\nThe charge of sedition, under the guise of which the police have been given a carte blanche to enter the JNU campus, to raid student hostels, arrest and detain students, including Kanhaiya Kumar, the current president of the JNU Students Union, is an alibi for the incursion of an authoritarian regime onto the university campus. Under Indian law sedition applies only to words and actions that directly issue a call to violence. The peaceful demonstration and gathering of citizens does not constitute criminal conduct. The police action on JNU campus is illegal under the constitution of India.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #e7e6e2;\">An open, tolerant, and democratic society is inextricably linked to critical thought and expression cultivated by universities in India and abroad. As teachers, students, and scholars across the world, we are watching with extreme concern the situation unfolding at JNU and refuse to remain silent as our colleagues (students, staff, and faculty) resist the illegal detention and autocratic suspension of students. </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">We urge the Vice Chancellor of Jawaharlal Nehru University to protect members of the university community and safeguard their rights.</b></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #e7e6e2; font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #e7e6e2; font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\nDated/- 15 February 2016</div>\n</blockquote>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; font-size: 1em; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<ol style=\"list-style: none; margin: 0px 0px 15px 30px; padding: 0px;\">\n<li style=\"background-color: white; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: decimal; margin: 10px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">Asma Abbas, Bard College at Simon\u2019s Rock</li>\n<li style=\"background-color: white; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: decimal; margin: 10px 0px 0px; padding: 0px;\">Syed Shahid Abbas, Institute of Development Studies, Brighton, U.K.</li>\n<li style=\"background-color: white; list-style-position: outside; list-style-type: decimal; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">The Board of Directors of Press Trust of India&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Press Council of\nIndia, WHERE GEELANI WAS DOING SEDITION &nbsp;is a statutory body in India that governs the\nconduct of the print media. The Council's actions may not be questioned unless\nit is proved to be in violation of the constitution, which makes it an\nexceedingly powerful body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But the fact remains,\nthat this body has turned a Nelson\u2019s eye to anti-national PRESSTITUTES. Justice\nChandramauli Kumar Prasad is Chairman of the Council as of 2015.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The immediate past\nChairman was Markandey Katju (2011 \u2013 2014) The Press Council is headed by a\nChairman: usually, a retired judge of the Supreme Court of India . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: 'times new roman', serif; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jab ghaayal huaa himaalay, khatre me.n paDii\naazaadii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the great Himalayas were wounded and our\nfreedom was in danger,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jab tak thii saa.ns laDe ve, phir apnii laash\nbichha dii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They fought until their last breath and then\nlaid their corpses to the ground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sangiin pe dhar kar maatha, so gaye amar\nbaliidaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Resting their heads on bayonets, these\nimmortal martyrs fell into an eternal sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jo shahiid hue hai.n unkii, zaraa yaad karo\nqurbaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember the sacrifice of those martyrs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jab desh me.n thii diivaalii, ve khel rahe\nthe holii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When our country celebrated Diwali, they were\nplaying Holi on the battlefield.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jab ham baiThe the gharo.n me.n, ve jhel rahe\nthe golii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As we sat comfortably in our homes, they were\nfiring bullets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">the dhanya javaan ve apane, thii dhanya vah\nunkii javaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blessed were those soldiers, and blessed was\ntheir youth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jo shahiid hue hai.n unkii, zaraa yaad karo\nqurbaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember the sacrifice of those martyrs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">koii sikh koii jaaT maraaThaa, koii gurkhaa\nkoii madaraasii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some were Sikh, Jaat, or Marathi; some were\nGurkha or Madrasi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">sarhad par marnevaala har viir thaa\nbhaaratvaasii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But each man who died on the border was an\nIndian,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jo khuun giraa parvat par, wah khuun thaa\nhindustaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And the blood that stained the mountainside\nwas Indian blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jo shahiid hue hai.n unkii, zaraa yaad karo\nqurbaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember the sacrifice of those martyrs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">thii khuun se lathpath kaayaa, phir bhii\nbanduuk uThaa ke<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although their bodies were soaked in blood,\nthey still raised their guns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">das das ko ek ne maaraa, phir gir gaye hosh\nga.nvaa ke<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each man shot tens of enemy soldiers and then\nfell unconscious to the ground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jab ant samay aayaa to kah gaye ki ab marte\nhai.n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the final moment came, they said: \u201cNow\nwe shall die.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">khush rahnaa desh ke pyaaro, ab ham to safar\nkarte hai.n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My beloved countrymen, stay happy. We now\nbegin our final journey to the afterlife.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">kyaa log the ve diivaane, kyaa log the ve\nabhiimaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They displayed such passion and dignity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jo shahiid hue hai.n unkii, zaraa yaad karo\nqurbaani<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember the sacrifice of those martyrs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">tum bhuul na jaao unko, is liye kahii yah\nkahaanii<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This story has been recounted so that you do\nnot forget them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jo shahiid hue hai.n unkii, zaraa yaad karo\nqurbaani<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember the sacrifice of those martyrs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jai hind, jai hind kii senaa<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">jai hind, jai hind, jai hind!</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\">Victory to India and its armed forces!</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">February 12, 2016 at\n4:27 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
