Don\u2019t interrupt . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t say things like \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u2018I don\u2019t want back chat\n\u2018<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u2018 When I want your\nopinion, I\u2019ll ask for it,\u2019</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u2018Keep your mouth shut,\nyou liar\u2019&nbsp;</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allow your child to act\nhis age. You are supposed to enjoy his childishness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-eb0r2npc0dk/VrdhhhMkICI/AAAAAAABD0Q/zrOHhgTqtp4/s1600/im5gnages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-eb0r2npc0dk/VrdhhhMkICI/AAAAAAABD0Q/zrOHhgTqtp4/s1600/im5gnages.png\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t call a small\nchild selfish.&nbsp; In Hinduism we do NOT\ncremate a small child ( less than 27 months of age ) whose EGO is not formed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have small children\nin the house keep away breakable items, good furniture , so that you don\u2019t get\nstressed. Don\u2019t fly off the handle and rush to wipe away a mark he made on the\nwall. Enjoy that mark.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>Your home is for you to live in , NOT for\nothers to gape at. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VzTycq2RpD8/VrdM3oN0NoI/AAAAAAABDzQ/Bs6Uv7I2UQ4/s1600/do9hwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VzTycq2RpD8/VrdM3oN0NoI/AAAAAAABDzQ/Bs6Uv7I2UQ4/s400/do9hwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This avoids stress and\nresulting actions which damage the small child\u2019s psyche.&nbsp; That does NOT mean he can throw shit on the\nwall every day deliberately.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uINoRkCVRPE/Vrdhazg6_1I/AAAAAAABD0M/7jccsTPywo0/s1600/ima5GBges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uINoRkCVRPE/Vrdhazg6_1I/AAAAAAABD0M/7jccsTPywo0/s1600/ima5GBges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Make as few rules as\npossible in the home . If you make any rule like keeping dirty footwear outside\nthe door and ensure that they are clear.&nbsp;\nInvolve children in making the rules , if possible.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Form informal &nbsp;agreements with children rather than imposing\nyour brute will on them. Explain why the rules are important so that they\nunderstand .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p6OlqHN4i3c/VrdhHGCTfHI/AAAAAAABD0I/tGmikMkC_w0/s1600/im4ADBages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p6OlqHN4i3c/VrdhHGCTfHI/AAAAAAABD0I/tGmikMkC_w0/s1600/im4ADBages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just spanking your child , to use pain as NEGATIVE FEEDBACK will\ndecrease the quality of your relationship with them. One day you will be weaker\nthan your child .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decode the behavior --\nwhy is he acting this way?&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cJSO-zncpmk/Vrdg_F79SyI/AAAAAAABD0E/SzaO3Reh5UI/s1600/downlo8888ad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"153\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cJSO-zncpmk/Vrdg_F79SyI/AAAAAAABD0E/SzaO3Reh5UI/s320/downlo8888ad.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid taking a telephone call when the child has\nsomething important to tell you. The best communication between you and the\nchild will occur when others are not around. Don\u2019t ask why, but do ask what\nhappened.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Show that you accept the child himself, regardless of what he has or\nhas not done- this is THE most important part of child rearing&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EkqT-plsPMc/VrdNax6WMuI/AAAAAAABDzY/3S-mPg8PlsY/s1600/i999mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EkqT-plsPMc/VrdNax6WMuI/AAAAAAABDzY/3S-mPg8PlsY/s1600/i999mages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">PARENTING FOR HOMOSEXUALS IS BEYOND THE SCOPE OF THIS POST.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WDW6RX3w3CU/Vrdg4_boDbI/AAAAAAABD0A/XQBdvGDnuOE/s1600/downlo44ad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WDW6RX3w3CU/Vrdg4_boDbI/AAAAAAABD0A/XQBdvGDnuOE/s320/downlo44ad.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Choose books to read\nand movies to watch with your child, with the express goal of building\ncharacter. There is NO need to fear , that by making your child too happy , you\nwill spoil him.&nbsp; A happy home is the fertile\nground in which all good affections grow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life affords no greater\nresponsibility, no greater privilege, than the raising of the next generation.\nGod has ensured that CHANGE is the only constant.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tY-9Dw0iEDk/VrdgyO_TtfI/AAAAAAABDz8/K3EAWd82f8s/s1600/downEEBload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tY-9Dw0iEDk/VrdgyO_TtfI/AAAAAAABDz8/K3EAWd82f8s/s320/downEEBload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A wise man can live in\npeace with things he cannot change. Never try to do things you cant. What is\nthe point in teaching a donkey to sing. It is a sheer waste of time and effort.\nNo dream can become true unless you have some skill and go to work.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parents\nmust inject skills into the child. Faith and trust are the seeds which bring\nthe sweet fruits of success. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self esteem is required\nto make a person mentally healthy.&nbsp; Never\ndestroy the child\u2019s self esteem by making him feel like a piece of shit. To be a\nsuccessful you must get your children which you produced , be exited about\nlife.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MCyiN-rRXnI/VrdgqP5Aq9I/AAAAAAABDz4/TglBm-sjZ2k/s1600/dow222nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MCyiN-rRXnI/VrdgqP5Aq9I/AAAAAAABDz4/TglBm-sjZ2k/s400/dow222nload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Life is a festival only to those who live with enthusiasm.&nbsp; Lack of enthusiasm wrinkles the soul. &nbsp;The parenting must be such that the child\nknows for sure that it is futile to di a well when he gets thirsty. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child must be taught to take\nresponsibility for his failures. &nbsp;&nbsp;Teach\nhim that the kite rises only against the wind. Good manners are the best\nletters of recommendation. Don\u2019t swear like the captain. Laughter is the\ncheapest and BEST luxury at home , it electrifies the nerves and cleanse the\nsystem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-H2bCRudwpZE/Vrdgi0ghwPI/AAAAAAABDz0/QPb352TSHwQ/s1600/dow66nload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"274\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-H2bCRudwpZE/Vrdgi0ghwPI/AAAAAAABDz0/QPb352TSHwQ/s400/dow66nload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Real richness consists of a\nsinging heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teach the child NOT to\ntake tomorrow to bed with him.&nbsp; There is\na difference between planning and worrying. Planning is constructive, worry is\ndestructive. Try to forget useless things.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To remember everything is to make\nyour mind a dustbin. Children do NOT have such problems usually, unless the\nchild is high strung. &nbsp;The greatest\nwealth is contentment with little- let the child understand this. The western\nmind might find this very funny.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-whrqoX5AmJs/VrdgcoDdcqI/AAAAAAABDzw/8LXDhGGlG1M/s1600/dow33ecvbnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-whrqoX5AmJs/VrdgcoDdcqI/AAAAAAABDzw/8LXDhGGlG1M/s400/dow33ecvbnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is better to aim at a good thing and miss\nthan to aim at a bad thing and hit. Success has to be seen in an intelligent\nmanner. The purpose of life is not only to be happy, but also to be creative ,\nproductive and useful\u2014to make a difference that you lived at all on this\nplanet.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only people with inferiority complex wants to impress others. What\nmatters is how you played the game--not whether you lost or won-- or was fired!\nDo not go around copying others signatures. All imitations are plastic. There\nis great joy in being ordinary.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ffx7wqNeLws/VrdgSkz1i7I/AAAAAAABDzs/UjTO6dfU18s/s1600/do862gwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ffx7wqNeLws/VrdgSkz1i7I/AAAAAAABDzs/UjTO6dfU18s/s400/do862gwnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The smallest good deed is better than the\ngrandest good attention. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teach the child about\ncharity. &nbsp;Never betray a trust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never create guilt in\nthe child. Creating guilt in you is the oldest trick of all religions, except Hinduism.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">You have succeeded in\nlife when all you really want is only what you really need.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU ARE NEVER A LOSER\nUNLESS YOU QUIT TRYING.!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VdBSnzsnI6M/VrdgGYzVqGI/AAAAAAABDzo/N-gTb0sWM1M/s1600/B1z3777HGOCIcAAOhAB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VdBSnzsnI6M/VrdgGYzVqGI/AAAAAAABDzo/N-gTb0sWM1M/s320/B1z3777HGOCIcAAOhAB.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Praise your children\nopenly, reprehend them behind closed doors. &nbsp;Bind your children to you by a feeling of\nrespect and by gentleness than by fear. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a child lives with in\na home awash with criticism, he learns to condemn. If a child lives with love\nand fairness, he learns justice. &nbsp;The\nchild of a tiger will never be a PUSSY..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Childhood is a time for\nfree joyful play and self discovery. When we rush children through it, we rob\nthem of an innocent age they'll never pass through ever again. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is a sin.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L1t7tIeyZbM/VrePkIycYaI/AAAAAAABD04/FarkFh1wz4w/s1600/imVBNDEages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L1t7tIeyZbM/VrePkIycYaI/AAAAAAABD04/FarkFh1wz4w/s400/imVBNDEages.jpg\" width=\"359\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Character, moral fiber,\nan inner compass... lay the foundation for a happy, healthy future. They matter\nmore than any school report card or trophy ever will.&nbsp; Teach your child early in life , that good\ncan always triumph over evil. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A happy moral family is\nbut an earlier heaven. You don\u2019t really understand human nature unless you know\nwhy a happy child on a merry-go-round will wave at his parents every time\naround \u2013 and why his parents will always wave back. Check this out next time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hF8pdbL9Kz0/VrePYMGp5YI/AAAAAAABD00/yM6biqvr70Q/s1600/iWWCVBmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"218\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hF8pdbL9Kz0/VrePYMGp5YI/AAAAAAABD00/yM6biqvr70Q/s400/iWWCVBmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indeed, life affords no\ngreater privilege, than the raising of the next generation.&nbsp; Bind your children to you by a feeling of\nrespect and love than by fear. When kids feel loved, they become attached to\nus. That attachment makes them receptive to our guidance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Play with your children.\nLet them choose the activity, and don't worry about rules. Just go with the\nflow and have fun. &nbsp;&nbsp;Mothers must\nencourage &nbsp;daddy time, even if divorced. Kids\nwith engaged fathers do better in life&nbsp;\nand can cope better with whatever life throws at them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MmtRzQwbC68/VreOckWPXVI/AAAAAAABD0s/wLQvnB0a2Cs/s1600/Babybh655-Quotes-42.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MmtRzQwbC68/VreOckWPXVI/AAAAAAABD0s/wLQvnB0a2Cs/s400/Babybh655-Quotes-42.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS NECESSARY TO HAVE\nONE MEAL A DAY TOGETHER AS A WHOLE FAMILY.&nbsp;\nNO PICKING ON ANYBODY DURING THIS MEAL .&nbsp;\nNO DISCUSSING WORK OR SCHOOL. THIS IS A TIME TO CONNECT. &nbsp; &nbsp;NO WATCHING TV WHILE EATING . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DON\u2019T FORCE THE CHILD\nTO EAT DURING THIS BONDING MEAL , SOMETHING HE DOES NOT WANT TO EAT.&nbsp; &nbsp;YOU CAN DO THIS DURING HIS OTHER TWO MEALS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parents must NOT allow\nsmall children to eat junk food and drink sugary soft drinks. Once in a while\nfor a change it is OK. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Don\u2019t raise fat children\n\u2013 especially males whose asses are broader than their shoulders..</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/high-fructose-corn-syrup-fatty-liver.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/high-fructose-corn-syrup-fatty-liver.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/understanding-obesity-shedding.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/understanding-obesity-shedding.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Develop a SILENT\nGESTURE that your children will accept as a signal that they are being\ninappropriate and need to change their behavior. This helps them to respond to\nyour prompt without getting upset. &nbsp;Bitter words hurt .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ifNh9RX76Ys/VrhbO1VkP-I/AAAAAAABD1I/ejY2ok4Qy_M/s1600/downloddad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"191\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ifNh9RX76Ys/VrhbO1VkP-I/AAAAAAABD1I/ejY2ok4Qy_M/s200/downloddad.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t make your own\nchild feel worthless by making belittling comments. Look for gradual changes in\nbehavior. &nbsp;Watch the trends.&nbsp; Don\u2019t expect too much. Praise behavior that\nis coming closer to the desired goal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Teach your child to\nshare. When you share you multiply your happiness.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jYPuwfunqnU/VriWOXu3III/AAAAAAABD1c/5_hHX2xizi4/s1600/ima6YNXges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-jYPuwfunqnU/VriWOXu3III/AAAAAAABD1c/5_hHX2xizi4/s1600/ima6YNXges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parents who reason with\ntheir kids allow them to understand and learn in a nonjudgmental way. You can't\nexpect kids to do everything simply because you, as a parent, \"say\nso.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They want and deserve explanations. Kids who participate in decisions\nare more motivated to carry them out. Make suggestions and offer choices. Be\nopen to your child's suggestions as well.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As your child changes due to time,\nyou'll gradually have to change your parenting style. Chances are, what works\nwith your child now won't work as well in another two years. . Keep pace with\nyour child's development. Your child is growing up.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tOa1GuAsTnY/VriXEf4UsAI/AAAAAAABD1k/kom6_BV7Vcc/s1600/075bc61998399e258d2b7rr18d97ae4f7e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tOa1GuAsTnY/VriXEf4UsAI/AAAAAAABD1k/kom6_BV7Vcc/s400/075bc61998399e258d2b7rr18d97ae4f7e.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is NOT a potted plant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strive to nurture and\nencourage, even when disciplining your kids.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zas9QRQnWQ0/VriV7GfpZ_I/AAAAAAABD1Y/PE4Y4nA8EIM/s1600/Fathers-Day-5gQuotes-and-Stories.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zas9QRQnWQ0/VriV7GfpZ_I/AAAAAAABD1Y/PE4Y4nA8EIM/s400/Fathers-Day-5gQuotes-and-Stories.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Make your child feel\nvalued and loved, while teaching him the difference between right and wrong. A\nwarm touch is enough. &nbsp;Avoid blanket\nphrases like \"Good job!\" like a parrot.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead let the child know what exactly is being\nappreciated<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bEonYF2UQ_c/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bEonYF2UQ_c?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your children are\nquarreling, don't choose sides, but be fair and neutral. Children have long\nmemories when it comes to this aspect\u2014when you ALWAYS support the other child.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HvAfKxY-55A/VrigEispNKI/AAAAAAABD18/UJx8XAm9J-s/s1600/if-a-child-liv8kes-with-fairness-he-learns-justice-children-quote.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HvAfKxY-55A/VrigEispNKI/AAAAAAABD18/UJx8XAm9J-s/s320/if-a-child-liv8kes-with-fairness-he-learns-justice-children-quote.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Create an atmosphere in which your children\ncan come to you with a problem, however large or small. If your child says he\nhas to tell you something, make sure you take this seriously and drop\neverything you're doing..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are NOT a bad parent if you don't allow your\nchildren to have everything they want. You can say no but you should provide a good\nreason for saying no or offer an alternative. You cannot financially afford\ncertain things, right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o41sLQitpXw/Vrif5aIGllI/AAAAAAABD14/n4UCI1H339E/s1600/crying-is-c5566ommunication-not-manipulation-baby-quote.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"430\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-o41sLQitpXw/Vrif5aIGllI/AAAAAAABD14/n4UCI1H339E/s640/crying-is-c5566ommunication-not-manipulation-baby-quote.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Set aside day to go to\na park, lake, beach , or library depending on your child\u2019s interests. These are\nthings the child will remember in your old age.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you go for a school\nfunction where you child receives a prize, try and go early and sit in the\nfront row. &nbsp;My wife always did that. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your child has difficulty with the homework\ntry and assist him ( do NOT do it for him ) . &nbsp;Visit their teachers at open house to get a\nsense of how they are doing in school.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid food fights. A\nhealthy child instinctively knows how much to eat. If he refuses to finish\nwhatever food is on his plate, just let it go. He won't starve. Your child is\nNOT a garbage bin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once a week, allow your\nchildren to choose what's for dinner and cook it for them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sLxOo6WsvKY/Vrmz-AYLdlI/AAAAAAABD2s/_iOZH5R-nYA/s1600/ifb%2Bmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sLxOo6WsvKY/Vrmz-AYLdlI/AAAAAAABD2s/_iOZH5R-nYA/s400/ifb%2Bmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PAY ATTENTION WHEN YOUR CHILD DEMANDS A PARTICULAR TYPE OF FOOD-- SAY AN ORANGE OR LASSI.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_118M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/02/effective-parenting-indian-way-part-3.html?showComment=1455011499023#c1249053474665491387\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">February 9, 2016 at 3:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_118MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nLET ME BREAK A BOMBSHELL TODAY .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS WILL CAUSE MY REVELATIONS TO JUMP UP TO 14.35%<br />\n<br />\nPREGNANT WOMEN HAVE FOOD CRAVINGS .. EVEN WE HAVE FOOD CRAVINGS OF CERTAIN TYPES.<br />\n<br />\nOUR BRAINS HAVE FIGURED OUT WHAT MINERALS AND VITAMINS WE NEED AND DIRECTS OUR SUBCONSCIOUS TO EAT THAT FOOD.<br />\n<br />\nPREGNANT WOMEN WANT FOLIC ACID .<br />\n<br />\nNOW I WILL SAY SOMETHING FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THIS PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nGOD ALTERS YOUR TASTE BUDS DEPENDING ON WHAT YOUR BODY NEEDS.<br />\n<br />\nVISHU / ONAM SADHYA ( KERALA FESTIVAL FEAST ) MUST SATISFY EVERY TYPE OF TASTE BUD -A SORT OF FORMATTING .<br />\n<br />\nThe tongue is covered with more than 9,100 taste buds that help us to detect sweet, salty, bitter or sour flavours.<br />\n<br />\nThe taste buds themselves are a collection of cells on the surface of the tongue, each housing about 50 taste cells. The buds renew themselves every ten days .<br />\n<br />\nLIKE HOW THE RIVER LOOKS THE SAME EXTERNALLY , YET THE WATER FLOWS AND CONTENT IS DIFFERENT.<br />\n<br />\nTHE DEAD TONGUE CELLS MUST BE SCRAPPED OFF EVERY MORNING FOR HEALTH ( CANDIDA )<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS TO ALLOW NEW BUDS COMING IN PLACE , AND ITS SENSITIVITY IS NOT DEADENED .<br />\n<br />\nWHEN SENSITIVITY IS DEADENED THE FEEDBACK LOOP IS AFFECTED AND YOUR TONGUE CANNOT GIVE A MESSAGE TO THE BRAIN , WHAT TYPE OF INPUT IS GOING IN.<br />\n<br />\nIN 6000 YEAR OLD AYURVEDA FOOD IS \"PREVENTIVE MEDICINE\"<br />\n<br />\nPROBABLY IN DUE COURSE , I WILL TALK ABOUT ELECTROMAGNETIC ENERGY IN THE MOOLADHARA CHAKRA ( SURVIVAL SEAT ) WHICH IS STOLEN BY PERVERTS WHO ENGAGE IN ANAL SEX.<br />\n<br />\nTHEIR CRIMINAL GENES TELL THEM WHEN THEY ARE ENERGY DEFICIENT --LIKE HUMAN THIRST.<br />\n<br />\nthe males who go on all fours , sticking their anus up, like the famous bollywood crypto jew Indian director are the MOST depraved. the benami media shows this pervert as an ICON.<br />\n<br />\npranayama ( deep diaphragmatic breathing-- not TRIPLE SRIs hyperventilation ) is important as the lung inner lining cells renews every 17 days.<br />\n<br />\nThe lungs contain different cells that renew at different rates. The alveoli or air sac cells - needed for the exchange of oxygen / gases , deep in the lungs have a steady progress of regeneration that takes about a year.<br />\n<br />\nOIL PULLING WITH VIRGIN COCONUT OIL , IS FOR TONGUE THAN FOR TEETH AND GUMS. THIS IS KERALA AYURVEDA .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS BEING TOLD FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THIS PLANET . .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your rules vary from\nday to day in an unpredictable fashion or if you enforce them only\nintermittently, your child's misbehavior is your fault, not his. &nbsp;&nbsp;Children get confused.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your most important disciplinary tool is\nconsistency. Identify your non-negotiables. The more your authority is based on\nwisdom and not on power, the less your child will challenge it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children treat others\nthe way their parents treat them. Your relationship with your child is the\nfoundation for her relationships with others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Show your child how and\nwhen he should apologize. It will not reduce him. Show him the power of truth. Don't\naccept disrespect from your child. Never allow him to be rude or say hurtful\nthings to you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you see a small child abusing his own parents in public you\nknow what type of parenting has taken place. The art of conversation is an\nimportant social skill, but parents often neglect to teach it. Show your child\nhow to become a responsible citizen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Respect parenting\ndifferences. Support your spouse's basic approach to raising kids -- unless\nit's way out of line. &nbsp;Endless arguments\nwith your spouse &nbsp;will do more harm to\nyour marriage and your child's sense of security than if you accept standards\nthat are slightly different from your own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good parenting means rethinking\nand rearranging your priorities. &nbsp;It means\nsacrificing what you want to do for what your child needs to do. &nbsp;Be there mentally as well as physically for\nyour child.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pushing your child to\ndo better aint gonna work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Setting limits helps\nyour child develop a sense of self-control. Encouraging independence ( provide\na safety net ) helps him develop a sense of self-direction. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Savor the moments of\nlaughter and play . &nbsp;&nbsp;Enjoy it now -- it\nwill be over far too fast never to come back EVER &nbsp;\u2013 don\u2019t miss the bus&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid making your child\ntake antibiotics .&nbsp; Overprescribing\nantibiotics can cause tremendous damage to your child.&nbsp; He is NOT gonna die. His young body can\nrecover from minor bacterial ailments. There is NO antibiotic for viruses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your child has fever\ndon\u2019t send his to school. &nbsp;However remember\nthat a fever is not something to fear. Fever is not an illness, rather, it is a\nsymptom of sickness and is usually a positive sign that the body is fighting\ninfection</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fever is actually a\nsignal that an immune system is working well and in older children who do not\nappear to be particularly distressed, fever is a positive sign. It is evidence\nthat the child has an active immune system. Fever does not harm your brain or\nyour body, although it does increase your need for fluids.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fevers generally do not\nneed to be treated with medication unless your child is uncomfortable or has a\nhistory of FEBRILE CONVULSIONS. The fever may be important in helping your\nchild fight the infection. It is rare for a fever to rise higher than 104 F,\nand as long as your child does not seem distressed, there is no harm in letting\na fever run its course<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In most cases, rest and\nplenty of fluids is all that's needed when a fever strikes. Fever does increase\nfluid loss, so it's important to give your child plenty of fluids, even if they\ndon't feel thirsty, to prevent dehydration. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are some\ninstances, however, when a fever does require medical attention.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This includes:-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Fever in an infant\nyounger than 3 months (at any temperature)<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Fever above 102.5\ndegrees F in children between 3 months and 36 months, if they appear ill<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Anytime a fever rises\nover 104.5 degrees F</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In children 5 years and\nunder, fever can also lead to a seizure, known as a febrile seizure. Though\nthis can be frightening, it typically will cause no lasting effects.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During a\nfebrile seizure, lay your child on his side or stomach on the ground, loosen\nany tight clothing and support the child to prevent injury. When the seizure\nstops, you should seek medical attention right away to be sure the seizure was\nnot caused by something other than the fever, such as meningitis or bacteria in\nthe blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Allowing a fever run\nits course is typically the best choice to help your child fight off a viral or\nbacterial infection \u2026 Destroying symptoms is a wrong thing to do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZLmKGTNdvBQ/Vr4j_Uc-cOI/AAAAAAABD-Q/y661CIQUYkI/s1600/iGLmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZLmKGTNdvBQ/Vr4j_Uc-cOI/AAAAAAABD-Q/y661CIQUYkI/s1600/iGLmages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take steps &nbsp;to bolster your child's immune system to ward\noff pathogens by proper nutrition, exercise, &nbsp;and high-quality REM sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Toilet training is beyond the scope of this post. However the child must know that your love is unconditional even if he pees on the sofa.</span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-i-wwtCyIkMk/Vr4kFmWOkoI/AAAAAAABD-U/Imdp9rYIcOU/s1600/ima69ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-i-wwtCyIkMk/Vr4kFmWOkoI/AAAAAAABD-U/Imdp9rYIcOU/s1600/ima69ges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you have to\nconfront your child, criticism which undermine self-esteem and can lead to\nresentment. &nbsp;Instead, make sure he knows\nalthough you want and expect better next time, your love is there no matter\nwhat.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consider\nhow age is affecting the child's behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t gift your own\nchild with an inferiority complex, an idea that they can never be good enough\nin your eyes. If you want to help them improve their behavior, talk about\nmeeting their goals on their own terms, instead of telling them to act like\ntheir classmate or neighbor. This will help them develop a sense of self\ninstead of having an inferiority complex.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SswOEefa7pk/Vr4j2cRQHfI/AAAAAAABD-M/iAFKyU9fUWw/s1600/a-dad-is-someone-who-holds-you-when-you-cry-scolds-you-when-you-break-the-rulngvces-shines-with-pride-when-you-succeed-and-has-faith-in-you-even-when-you-fail.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"214\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SswOEefa7pk/Vr4j2cRQHfI/AAAAAAABD-M/iAFKyU9fUWw/s320/a-dad-is-someone-who-holds-you-when-you-cry-scolds-you-when-you-break-the-rulngvces-shines-with-pride-when-you-succeed-and-has-faith-in-you-even-when-you-fail.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children need\nboundaries and it is your responsibility as a parent to provide this guidance.\nA child who has been allowed to behave as they please and had their every whim\nindulged will struggle in adult life when they have to obey the rules of\nsociety<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ideally, your child\nshould love you more than he fears your rules.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nSet reasonable rules, and enforce them reasonably. &nbsp;Avoid extreme punishment, for minor\ninfractions, or anything that involves physically hurting your own child.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Cwq4ZYyz9Co/Vr4kMQ8seZI/AAAAAAABD-Y/tr_rV1MOC0g/s1600/imag000khtges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Cwq4ZYyz9Co/Vr4kMQ8seZI/AAAAAAABD-Y/tr_rV1MOC0g/s1600/imag000khtges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enforce the same rules\nall the time, and to resist your child's attempts to manipulate you into making\nexceptions. If you let your child do something he or she is not supposed to do\njust because he is throwing a tantrum in public, then this shows that your\nrules are breakable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your child feels like your rules are breakable, he'll\nhave no incentive to stick to them. But remember a small child cries to communicate.&nbsp; Be kind.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AE25TBk77Ic/Vr4jwMrRjtI/AAAAAAABD-E/inOHobUViUM/s1600/cherJNGish.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"305\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AE25TBk77Ic/Vr4jwMrRjtI/AAAAAAABD-E/inOHobUViUM/s320/cherJNGish.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never allow your grown\nup child to drive a wedge between you and your spouse.&nbsp; They watch &nbsp;dysfunctional western family TV canned\nlaughter serials, and they know how to do it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is important that\nyour children think of you and your spouse as a united front. Both of you must\nsay NO to a week\u2019s school excursion . &nbsp;&nbsp;If one says YES and the other says NO, this is\na big mistake .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n<br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">You shouldn't argue\nwith your spouse in front of the children.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">If at all your argue, s</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">how\nthem that when people disagree, they can discuss their differences peacefully. Your\nkids should feel like there's a sense of order and a logic to things in their\nhousehold and in their family life. This can help them feel safe and at peace.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-INh_vvGEWm0/Vr4jeSuGREI/AAAAAAABD98/xKS5gcqgcJk/s1600/image9OSWs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-INh_vvGEWm0/Vr4jeSuGREI/AAAAAAABD98/xKS5gcqgcJk/s1600/image9OSWs.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">It is natural for a child to </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">rebel\nat boundaries and limitations , but they are perceptive enough to know that concerned\nparents guide and love them.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criticize your child's behavior,\nnot your child. &nbsp;Don\u2019t call him a piece\nof shit, like in the west.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be stern and serious, but not &nbsp;mean, when you tell them what you expect. </span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid public humiliation at all\ncosts . This will backfire when equations change wit time , and the child\nbecomes more powerful than you.</span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Uq-OGYggQuE/Vr4jl21NDzI/AAAAAAABD-A/dhY8aCQBdxA/s1600/ima6YNXges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Uq-OGYggQuE/Vr4jl21NDzI/AAAAAAABD-A/dhY8aCQBdxA/s1600/ima6YNXges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of ordering\nyour child to do something , enlist his help without begging .&nbsp; The earlier they learn to help you, the\nlonger they will be willing to. &nbsp;Don\u2019t let\nyour grown &nbsp;child see you snooping through\nhis personal items like diary\u2014you will have to listen to what he says after\nthat. Trust will take a severe beating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One way to encourage\nthem to exercise is to get them to play a sport like soccer early on in life,\nso they find a passion that is also healthy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">POINT THEM IN THE RIGHT\nDIRECTION\u2014DO NOT PUSH THEM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pUdOW0zLze0/Vr4jUw0FHBI/AAAAAAABD94/S-tBclaE8Zw/s1600/imagBTHes.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pUdOW0zLze0/Vr4jUw0FHBI/AAAAAAABD94/S-tBclaE8Zw/s400/imagBTHes.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They need to learn that\ntheir own actions have consequences (good and bad). By doing so, it helps them\nto become good decision makers. Let your children make their own mistakes. Life\nis a great teacher.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don't be too quick to rescue your child from the results of\ntheir own actions if the consequences are not overly severe. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hold back from taunting him &nbsp;\"I told you so\" when your child\nlearns a life lesson on his own.
