font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN MY WIFE SAW MY\nPUZZLED FACE , SHE WHISPERED &nbsp;\u2013 \u201c I ALLOW\nHIM TO DO THAT, HE WILL GET OVER THIS PHASE . &nbsp;NOTHING IS DAMAGED, NEITHER THE\nBOOKS NOR THE SOFA.&nbsp; PROBABLY IT GIVES HIM\nSOME RELEASE\u201d. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS NOT THAT HE\nHATED HIS BOOKS\u2014 HE WAS ALWAYS A TOPPER IN CLASS. &nbsp;HIS BEHAVIOR WAS ALWAYS IDEAL . &nbsp;HIS TEACHERS COULD NOT STOP SINGING HIS PRAISES\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I GUESS IT GAVE HIM A\nKICK.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try to ignore mildly\ndisruptive behaviors as a way for your child to release his or her pent up\nenergy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;However, \u201cconsistent\u201d &nbsp;destructive, abusive, or intentionally\ndisruptive behavior should always be punished.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Parents must first\ndecide which behaviors they won\u2019t tolerate, &nbsp;like killing / maiming a bird or an animal for\npleasure. &nbsp;It\u2019s crucial to stick to these\nguidelines. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punishing a behavior\none day and allowing it the next is harmful to a child\u2019s improvement. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t expect electrical\nswitch ON-OFF reactions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Give some time for the\nchild to weigh his options and get his act together. &nbsp;&nbsp;99.9% he will do what you want him to do on\nhis own terms and timetable .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF HE DOES NOT PUT OFF\nTHE TV OR GET UP FROM BED WITHIN 3 SECONDS OF YOU HOLLERING AT HIM , THE SKY\nWONT FALL DOWN.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"380\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tksO_PRoENc/Vq8P8OixvLI/AAAAAAABDo0/4mGhpbb2gRE/s400/36223184D66_FLleft_1_PV5FMBeating20AM_xlarge.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t sweat the small\nstuff. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Not everything is a big\ndeal.&nbsp; Ask yourself, will this matter a\nyear from now on. &nbsp;Time solves most\nthings.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yFxakA2uhVc/Vq8R__IGYXI/AAAAAAABDpA/z59VYgnaIHQ/s1600/imagdddes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-yFxakA2uhVc/Vq8R__IGYXI/AAAAAAABDpA/z59VYgnaIHQ/s1600/imagdddes.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are a good dad,\nyour child will honor you and you will be his ULTIMATE HERO. There is NO prize\nbigger than this. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-33HCF74Qf5Q/Vq8WlFNZrrI/AAAAAAABDpY/YI1pLfdYIfc/s1600/ima72111ges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-33HCF74Qf5Q/Vq8WlFNZrrI/AAAAAAABDpY/YI1pLfdYIfc/s400/ima72111ges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The biggest punishment\nfor a man is when his own son treats him like shit. The greatest sorrow for a\nman is to see his own son wasting away. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xNd6d7DtffI/Vq8XQ6ECmEI/AAAAAAABDpo/iKtZmxVBeUw/s1600/father%2Banb78d%2Bson%2Bquotes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xNd6d7DtffI/Vq8XQ6ECmEI/AAAAAAABDpo/iKtZmxVBeUw/s400/father%2Banb78d%2Bson%2Bquotes.jpg\" width=\"322\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No man likes to lose.\nBut when his own son beats him in a game of chess or tennis, for the first\ntime, &nbsp;he feels on top of the world. &nbsp;&nbsp;Remember\nthis -&nbsp; &nbsp;It is a paradox you must understand !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IfsRQG3538k/Vq8W3YTGbRI/AAAAAAABDpg/6mdTQq8w6b8/s1600/downloanytd.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"261\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IfsRQG3538k/Vq8W3YTGbRI/AAAAAAABDpg/6mdTQq8w6b8/s320/downloanytd.png\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AN INDIAN PARENT\nTEACHES THE CHILD &nbsp;THE MEANING OF PRAYER\nEARLY IN LIFE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For this the child must\nsee the mother praying to arouse the curiosity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later the &nbsp;mother must initiate the child to prayer.&nbsp; &nbsp;Let\nthe child pray with the mother till it becomes a habit at dusk ( sandhya\nvandanam for Hindus ) OR before bedtime. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: When my mother brought the evening lamp Sandhya Vandanam it was compulsory to see it towards east. &nbsp; &nbsp;So we would rush towards the west with eyes closed.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZHrU41zoU2k/Vq87DvRyqRI/AAAAAAABDqA/9SJiaztGKwM/s1600/29d1065bb1dd36br61a7edd151f74f0fa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ZHrU41zoU2k/Vq87DvRyqRI/AAAAAAABDqA/9SJiaztGKwM/s640/29d1065bb1dd36br61a7edd151f74f0fa.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As children myself and\nmy two sisters prayed ( singing Sanskrit/ Malayalam bhajans ) every single day at twilight sitting in front of a lamp ( palms together ) .. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-CbMDh_bv2lE/Vq86flBCwzI/AAAAAAABDp4/zTBSyJtQIfQ/s1600/Shloggk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When praying, try to\nkeep the details and words appropriate to your child's age level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Start off by thanking\nGod for being with you and &nbsp;your family,\nthank him for his great, unconditional love. &nbsp;Ask him for guidance to follow the path of\ntruth , love and fairness. Ask God to forgive your mistakes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" seek wisdom.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: !&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">It new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children learn by\nwatching and are influenced by friends and classmates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" where I studied.. &nbsp;&nbsp;The\nprincipal was a teacher when I studied in that school.&nbsp; &nbsp;She\nremembered me and asked about my sisters taking their names . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new and\nquality of students have come down. \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , for the BEST OUTGOING STUDENT when he passed out of school --&nbsp; general proficient in studies, &nbsp;athletics, &nbsp;games, speeches, math olympiads , extra \u2013curricular class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" bus at the age of 62.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">What does she know\nabout being a mother ?</span></div>\n<div <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 1200 species\nof bacteria, yeast and other organisms numbering 100 trillion in total inhabit\nthe human gastrointestinal tract and make up the \"gut flora\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an average adult the\nbacteria weigh about 2kg &nbsp;and the number\nof individual organisms outnumbers the total number of cells in the human body\nby a factor of 100 to 1<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida albicans is a\nnaturally occurring, and usually benign yeast, that grows in the\ngastrointestinal tract.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Broad spectrum\nanti-bioticsons don't discriminate between friendly and pathogenic bacteria.\nThis means that every time you take one of these drugs for an infection you're\nare wiping out large numbers of the friendly bacteria in your intestines that\ngive protection from other, potentially harmful, intestinal residents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida,is unaffected\nby antibiotics and, in the absence of its natural bacterial counterbalance,\nproceeds to reproduce wildly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida is like a\nseven-headed dragon \u2013 nearly impossible to kill. The most important factor in\ngetting rid of Candida is boosting your immune system! Any infection with Candida\nalbicans should be taken very seriously.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This YEAST can easily\nbecome a FUNGUS, and in that form it is dangerous and near-incurable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When it\nover-proliferates in the body, though, the symptoms can be debilitating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A healthy colon\ncontains around 1000 bacteria to 1 Candida yeast cell. The bacteria keep the\nCandida in check and prevent it from becoming mycelial (the chronic invasive FUNGAL\nform).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FUNGAL Candida can\nsprout roots like whiskers, hyphae that anchor themselves firmly in the gut\nlining. This mycelial Candida is the same as the white root system in the soil\nof mushrooms in the forest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This FUNGAL &nbsp;form of Candida is the \u201crogue\u201d form, the form\nthat is nearly impossible to get rid of. The lining of the gut is only 2 cells\nthick \u2013 you can imagine how easy it is to develop Leaky Gut Syndrome when\nCandida overgrows the bacteria in the colon!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fungal Candida can be\ncompared with a plant that has roots, as opposed to plant seeds. The yeast\nmanifestation of Candida are the \u201cseeds\u201d, and the chronic, fungal form of\nCandida are the \u201cplants\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The roots of the\nCandida are called rhizoids, and instead of soil to root in, they penetrate\nyour body tissues and suck the nutrients they need right out of your cells and\nbloodstream. This form of Candida is nearly impossible to get rid of and is\noften near-invisible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A mere 3000 Candida\nyeast cells injected into the bloodstream of an adult (an amount so small that\nit would be totally invisible to the naked eye) has a lethality of 98%. &nbsp;Death usually occurs from severely damaged\nheart valves or central nervous system involvement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through this perforated gut lining, large food molecules can pass into\nthe bloodstream, and cause all kind of allergies because these substances are\nnot supposed to enter the blood without first being digested, especially not in\nthe large molecular size they have before digestion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida overgrowth\nrelies on increased alkalinity in your intestines. It needs neutral or alkaline\nconditions to switch to its fungal form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By alkalizing its\nenvironment, Candida triggers a switch to its pathogenic, hyphal form, which is\nthe form that causes Leaky Gut Syndrome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Coconut oil, which\ncontains caprylic acid and lauric acid, is an effective antifungal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the reasons that\nprobiotics are so effective in treating Candida is that they produce small\namounts of lactic and acetic acid. This helps to rebalance the pH in your\nintestine and restore the acidity that is needed to curb the Candida\novergrowth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact one of the most common reasons that a Candida overgrowth\nhappens is that a course of antibiotics has killed the acid-producing bacteria\nin your stomach, thus making the environment too alkaline and allowing the\nCandida to thrive.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaginas are also highly acidic to prevent invading foreign\npathogens and to protect women from yeast or bacterial infections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The digestive system\u2019s\nacidic environment also protects the body from fungal, parasitic and bacterial\ninfections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">The cell wall of common\nintestinal yeast such as Candida species have been found to be made mainly from\ncellulose.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Cellulase is the enzyme that breaks down cellulose and hence, when\nsignificant concentrations come into contact with yeast cells the cell wall is\nirreparably damaged and the organism dies.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yeast do not\nrelease a flood of toxins when they die as occurs with most other anti-fungal\nagents so that the sufferer does not experience the usual die-off symptoms to\nany significant degree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The yeast should be\nunable to develop resistance to cellulase products as they lack the ability to\nmodify their cell wall<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once Candida has access\nto the bloodstream, it can reach into the sinus cavities and colonize every\norgan in the body, including the skin and the brain. Worse\u2014the tough cell wall\nof Candida yeast and its sticky biofilm are enough to protect it from\nantifungal medications and antifungal herbs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cell wall of\nCandida is made up of mostly sugars and proteins. The most important sugars\nthat make up the cell wall of Candida are called beta-glucans. (1) Beta-glucans\nare fibrous sugars. They are what give structure to the bran in grain and the\nwoody part of plants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The beta-glucans in the\ncell wall of Candida both stimulate and suppress an immune response. (2)\nBecause the cell wall of Candida can change its composition and influence the\nimmune system, this means that Candida overgrowth is sometimes very difficult\nto manage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Besides giving\nstructure to the cell wall of Candida, beta-glucans also are used as a\nstructural building block for Candida biofilm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Biofilm is a resilient,\nsticky matrix that Candida builds up around itself as it colonizes tissue in\nthe body. Like a camouflaged hideout, biofilm allows Candida to grow while\nprotecting it from the immune system. Biofilm can even disarm immune cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cellulase and\nhemicellulase contain enzymes that break apart the cell wall of Candida. These\nenzymes also degrade Candida biofilm, reducing its ability to hide from the\nimmune system and invade tissue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cellulase and\nhemicellulase break down the tough \u201croughage\u201d found in fruits, vegetables, and\ngrains. When left undigested, these fibrous sugars can slow digestion, prevent\nthe absorption of nutrients, and ultimately contribute to fungal overgrowth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nbattling Candida overgrowth, it is essential to include enzymes that break down\nCandida\u2019s cell wall and strip away its biofilm.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cellulase refers to a group of enzymes which,\nacting together, hydrolyze cellulose. &nbsp;Enzymatic\ndegradation (cellulase) is the most effective means of degrading cellulose . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida cell wall is\ncomposed of fiber and glycoproteins. Candida yeast has a cell wall composed of\nmannoprotein-1, glucan, chitin, mannoprotein-2 and plasma membrane. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although mannoprotein\nsounds like a protein it is actually a plant polysaccharide. The plasma\nmembrane however is a protein and the nucleus of the yeast cell is also a\nprotein of animal origin.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Digression:</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The western people\nafflicted by Alzhiemers must also know that Virgin Coconut oil infused with\nCannabis ( Marijuana ) extract is the only thing which can save you and even\nrecerse Alzhiemers and dementia.&nbsp; They\u2019re used as food to produce energy in\nbeneficial cells of all sorts. But when they\u2019re absorbed by an organism that is\nnot beneficial, they penetrate the cell membrane and weaken the cell, so it\njust disintegrates. Then white blood cells go in a gobble up the waste\nmaterial. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; This means that the Candida yeast &nbsp;cannot build up resistance to coconut oil,\nunlike other antifungals which can lose their effectiveness over time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The medium-chain saturated\nfatty acids in coconut oil are potent antimicrobial agents, effective against\nfungi, viruses and many bacteria. text-decoration: none;\">January 24, 2016 at 7:15 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCapt,<br />\n<br />\nThis is so confusing. Refined sugars/flours/soft drinks etc are said to make the body too acidic while alkalinity was supposed to be a good thing (lemon water first thing in the morning). I reckon this is about relative acidity/alkalinity and not absolute terms like pH below 4.5<br />\n<br />\nOn tv Ayurveda doctors keep on talking about \"ama\" and have nothing to offer other than naturopathic cures and cutting down on pitta foods like alcohol, meat, achaar, deep fried foods etc. Their thrust of course is on cures not prevention while the real aim should be robust health and fitness.<br />\n<br />\nMost are charlatans I suspect who use keywords like ama, ojas, pitta, kapha, vata etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe body just seems so complicated. Maybe urban dwellers are just all eating too much with little exercise after all. while an empty stomach is somewhere between 1 and 3, which is highly acidic; and the small intestine ranges between 6 and 6.5, which is slightly alkaline; while the colon runs between 5.5 to 7, which is slightly acidic; and the vagina is typically between 3.8 and 4.5, which is moderately acidic .<br />\n<br />\nIt needs an alkaline environment to change from its yeast form into the pathogenic fungal hyphae form.<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedg-SeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedg-SeD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While it is true that\nan acidic body (acidosis) can lead to a variety of health conditions like cancer,\nosteoporosis, chronic fatigue, muscle loss, high blood pressure, kidney stones,\ncravings for sugar and carbs and more, in regard to Candida we are talking\nabout the <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">pH level in the GUT&nbsp;</b> repeat &nbsp;SMALL INTESTINE .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Jgjk4Dy0V2c/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jgjk4Dy0V2c?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The official medical term for a yeast infection is candidiasis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">At normal levels, Candida yeast is harmless and exists alongside the trillions of other bacteria in the mouth, vagina, rectum and digestive tracts. But if there's an overgrowth, candida becomes a fungus and leads to significant health problems .</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2_E0nPQsWtY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2_E0nPQsWtY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Leaky gut is a more serious consequence of\ncandidiasis, occurring when Candida causes the intestinal wall to become\npermeable and allows partially digested proteins and other toxins to be\nreleased into the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In severe cases, known\nas invasive candidiasis, Candida can negatively impact vital parts of the body,\nincluding the blood, heart and brain \u2013 ultimately leading to hospitalization\nand, even death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are suffering\nfrom an autoimmune disease, any chronic disease, frequent infections, or a weak\nimmune system, chances are you are suffering from a leaky gut whether you\nexperience digestive disturbances or not. So focus on the gut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Since 80% of the immune system is in the gut,\nthis alone makes gut health a priority. Once the gut is healed, the rest of the\nbody can heal as well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida albicans\nproduces more than 200 chemical toxins that can be absorbed through the\nintestines into the blood, and that\u2019s when the intestinal walls are in good\nhealth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the intestinal walls become more permeable, imagine what those\ntoxins do to the immune system when Candida migrates throughout the body\nproducing toxic substances that incite the immune system\u2019s inflammatory\nresponse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These foreign, toxic\nchemicals wreck havoc on the body just like the toxic chemicals that are\nproduced during bacterial infections and other parasitic infections, which will\nalso be prevalent throughout the body with a leaky gut<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Leaky gut has been\nfound in association with asthma, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, irritable\nbowel (inflammatory bowel disease, or IBD, which includes Crohn\u2019s disease and\nulcerative colitis), lupus, hypothyroidism, kidney disease, multiple sclerosis,\npsoriasis, eczema, depression, chronic fatigue syndrome, heart failure, and\nceliac disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Garlic and Turmeric are\nnatural anti-fungal that will kill Candida, as is fresh grated coconut paste-\nthree essential ingredients in any Kerala curry. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acid-producing\nprobiotics like acidophilus are so effective at slowing and even reversing the\novergrowth\u2014we consume curd every single day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the digestive system\nwere to ever become too alkaline, then the health of your innards and\nsimultaneously your outsides are compromised. The increase of an alkaline\nnature can be a result of consuming sugary foods and beverages. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These act as the\noptimal food source for the natural yeast in your body and thus result in\novergrowth the alkaline state in the intestines also contributes to the\nactivation of the fungal gene of yeast,&nbsp;\nresulting in the infestation of Candida albicans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In today's Western\ndiet, refined sugars and carbohydrates are everywhere, largely disguised in\nphrases like glucose, fructose, lactose and maltose dextrose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When consumed at rates\nhigher than what's recommended or deemed acceptable yeast made alcohol/ wine\nwhich contains sugar, nurtures Candida growth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yeast fungus loves\nyeast . Avoid yeast containing foods when you are under Candida attack. This\nincludes beer, wine, bread, pastries, muffins etc..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The liver relies on a\nsteady supply of glutathione. When levels of glutathione are low,\ndetoxification slows down, and the liver becomes congested and toxic.\nGlutathione can help to detoxify acetaldehyde from tissues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The detox process\nmostly takes place in the liver. The liver is your number one detox organ. It\nhelps the body get rid of hormones, pharmaceutical drugs, environmental\nchemicals, heavy metals, and other poisons that age the body. Acetaldehyde\ndirectly affects the DNA in our cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Organic veggies, cruciferous\nvegetable&nbsp;&nbsp; aid the body in making\nglutathione. Glutathione is the most valuable antioxidant in the human body and\nplays a critical role in the detoxification process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a chemical binds\nlike acetaldehyde does to our DNA, it creates something called a DNA adduct.\nAnd this is one of the first steps toward the development of cancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the gut is\ndamaged, gluten from wheat must be avoided, completely. In a healthy gut, cells\nthat make up the lining of the intestinal wall bind tightly together. Trace\namounts of gluten can irritate these cells and deteriorate their bonds.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Celiac disease is an\nautoimmune disease in which a T-cell mediated immune response results in damage\nto the tissue of the small intestine. This reaction is triggered by the\ningestion of gluten, a protein found in grains, predominantly wheat, barley and\nrye. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>protein</b></span> found in the\ncell wall of Candida is very similar to gluten. &nbsp;As a result, the immune system can confuse\ngluten found in grains for the cell wall of Candida and mount a response\nagainst the gluten. The immune cell bound gluten then damages the small\nintestinal wall as in Celiac disease.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This protein is named\nHWP1, and its structure is very close to that of alpha-gliadin and gamma-gliadin,\ntwo of the protein groups found in gluten. It is this close similarity that\nconfuses your immune system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Candida Albicans\nattaches to the walls of your intestine and begins to spread, your immune\nsystem responds. As it attacks the Candida overgrowth, it also attempts to\ndestroy the surface proteins like HWP1.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By attacking this\nparticular protein (which is almost identical to the gluten proteins), your\nimmune system starts to build a sensitivity to gluten. Over time, this can turn\ninto an intolerance or even something very similar to celiac disease. &nbsp;&nbsp;Soon, an individual might find that eating\ngluten causes digestive issues, fatigue, headaches and many other symptoms of a\ngluten sensitivity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoiding gluten is\nusually a good idea if you suffer from Candida Related Complex. If you are\nalready suffering from a disturbed gut flora and a permeable intestinal lining,\neating gluten can trigger an inflammatory response that will set you back.\nFocus on avoiding foods that will inflame your digestive system, and eating\nfoods that will help to repair it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nbond between intestinal cells on the cell walls prevents large food particles,\nundigested sugars, undigested proteins, and gut microbes (parasites, bacteria,\nfungi) from leaking into the blood. Candida overgrowth also deteriorates the\nintestinal wall. Candida grows filaments or tentacles that \u201cdrill\u201d into the gut\nlining and grow into the gut wall.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The HWP1 protein only\nappears when Candida Albicans takes its fungal form. As you may know, Candida\ncan exist in both yeast and fungal forms. It is the fungal form in which\nCandida is able to grow more quickly and penetrate the intestinal lining. To\navoid a Candida overgrowth, you need to prevent Candida switching from its\nyeast form to its fungal form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A number of conditions\nneed to be in place for Candida to take its fungal form, but the most important\ncondition is that the surrounding environment must not be strongly acidic. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b>Again, Candida is much more likely to switch\nto its fungal (more dangerous) form in neutral or alkaline conditions.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in Kerala eat rice\nas Ayurveda does NOT recommend too much wheat . If at all we used wheat , we used a probiotic culture\nthat pre-digested the gluten proteins .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sugar consumption has been on the rise\nfor decades, and there is a direct correlation with our increased sugar\nconsumption and pretty much everything that\u2019s wrong with our bodies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the gut is not\nhealthy (flora is not balanced), gluten proteins harm the intestinal tract,\ncausing irritation and inflammation. Infection sets in wherever there is\nfood to eat.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scar tissue and other damaged tissue provide food for\nopportunistic infectious microbes like Candida and many other parasites. The more damaged the body, the more easily\ninfection can take root inside the body<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the gut is\ndamaged, Candida is running rampant. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, one of the important underlying causes of chronic yeast\ninfection can actually be hormonal imbalance \u2013 especially imbalance in\nsex-hormones like estrogen and progesterone. &nbsp;Estrogen ( 17-\u03b2-estradiol) increases the\ngrowth and survival of Candida.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida exists in two\nforms \u2013harmless oval yeast form and dangerous filamentous fungal form. A change\nfrom the oval to the filamentous form is necessary for infection establishment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">17-\u03b2-estradiol, the\npredominant type of estrogen during reproductive years, supported the\nconversion of oval form to the filamentous form.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lower estrogen levels\nare protective against infections while an increase in estrogen suppresses the\nimmunity against infections. This immunosuppressive effect of estrogen is responsible\nfor fungal infections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the activities\nof the good bacteria ( killed by broad spectrum anti-biotics ) is the\nmanufacture of a B vitamin, biotin, which exerts control over yeast.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When\nbiotin is lacking, as a result of damage by antibiotics to acidophilus,\nbifidobacteria, and the microflora ecology, yeast has a chance to change from\nit's simple yeast form into a different organism, an encroaching mycelial (\nvegetative ) fungus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida puts down\nminute rootlets which penetrate the tissues on which the yeast is growing. When\nthis happens to be the inner wall of the intestines, it breaks down the barrier\nwhich exists between the closed world of the bowel and the body.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Toxic debris,\nyeast waste products, and partially digested proteins are allowed into the\nblood stream, resulting in allergic and toxic reactions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Healthy bifidobacteria\nand acidophilus intestinal colonies can usually withstand one or two short episodes\nof antibiotics without serious harm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6A9JFaeU7Io/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6A9JFaeU7Io?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candidiasis may be confirmed\nby the presence of the yeast organism in feces or urine, by vaginal or throat\nswab, or by measuring specific Candida antibodies in the blood<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Chronic exposure to Candida, especially when\nthis yeast has colonized directly on or has become invasive into the mucosal\ntissues, can result in the elevation of specific antibodies in the IgG, IgA,\nand IgM classes (Candidiasis).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Elevated IgG can be\nindicative of past or ongoing infections.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Elevated IgA antibodies\nmay reflect a more superficial Candida infection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Elevated IgM reflects a\npresent infection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The detection of\nCandida antigen in serum is evidence that mucosal and immunological barriers\nhave been overwhelmed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3xRttWuf3wQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/3xRttWuf3wQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala we ate brown\nrice , which kept Candida away.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
