, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT IS THE NEED FOR THIS?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ASK OUR PM ZIONIST JEW\nDARLING NARENDRA MODI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/gm-ir8-rice-high-amylose-content.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/gm-ir8-rice-high-amylose-content.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/y4Y9DSZyapw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/y4Y9DSZyapw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take a clear glass of\nwater and spit into it within 30 minutes of waking up ( before brushing teeth ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Make sure you build up\na bunch of saliva, but just saliva from your mouth \u2013 don\u2019t cough up anything.\nDo this before you rinse, spit or put anything into your mouth. Then wait for\n15 minutes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your saliva will float\non the surface of the water, which is normal. However, if you see cloudy saliva\nthat sinks to the bottom of the glass like sediment, you may be seeing colonies\nof yeast. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You may also see the\nsaliva on the top with tiny strings that start to hang down that may look like\njellyfish, hair, or spider legs, or suspended specks of yeast floating in the\nmiddle of the glass.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wCtA16x6P84/VqYTY1NospI/AAAAAAABDgw/H77ClvcT6OI/s1600/testiggng-for-candida.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"408\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wCtA16x6P84/VqYTY1NospI/AAAAAAABDgw/H77ClvcT6OI/s640/testiggng-for-candida.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Organix Dysbiosis\ntest is a urine organic acids test measuring the by-products of microbial\nmetabolism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Dysbiosis,\" is described as an imbalance in the\nmicroecology of the digestive tract. When the microbial balance of the gut is\ndisturbed, opportunistic (\"bad\") bacteria can overgrow and impede the\neffects of the \"good\", predominant bacteria needed for a healthy gut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Urine is an important\nmedium for testing microbiology in the gut. Urine contains unique products of\nmicrobial metabolism which are used to measure small bowel yeast and bacterial\novergrowth. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TS4JFZf0JCs/VqYUup0PvVI/AAAAAAABDg8/3Nkdkx18TqQ/s1600/slide_ggg26.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TS4JFZf0JCs/VqYUup0PvVI/AAAAAAABDg8/3Nkdkx18TqQ/s400/slide_ggg26.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">D-arabinitol, is a\nspecific marker for Candida, in serum or urine.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/x92N2wgM0J4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/x92N2wgM0J4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ALMOST EVERY DAY TOILET PAPER OF INDIA ( USED ON BOTH SIDES ) GIVES TIPS FOR STEAMY SEX. &nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YQCSW0MLuUg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YQCSW0MLuUg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ALMOST ALL OF IT INVOLVES TRANSFERRING CANDIDA ALBICANS FUNGUS.</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/uMucnzIH4qk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/uMucnzIH4qk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida overgrowth\n(candida albicans) can lead Leaky gut syndrome which is medically referred to\nas intestinal permeability. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Again, leaky gut causes\nopenings develop in the gut wall. &nbsp;The\ncandida yeast grows roots or hypha (plural hyphae) which is a long, branching\nfilamentous cell of a fungus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hyphae spreads the bowel wall cells apart so\nthat acidic, harmful microorganisms and macromolecules are then able to pass\nthrough (leak) these openings and enter the circulatory system.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body is\nalerted to the invader and creates antibodies for protection, activates the\nimmune system, and thus is born a food allergy. Food allergies are directly\nlinked to leaky gut and candida yeast infection overgrowth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a result, leaky gut\nsyndrome and candida yeast infection can directly lead to many other systemic\ninflammatory and immune-related symptoms beyond food allergies, including\nrheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, multiple sclerosis, eczema,\nfibromyalgia, Crohn's disease, Raynaud's phenomenon, chronic urticaria (hives),\nand inflammatory bowel disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SLIMY MANI'S BROTHER(&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b style=\"background-color: white; font-family: sans-serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Swaminathan S. Anklesaria Aiyar</b><span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: sans-serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #252525; font-family: sans-serif; line-height: 22.4px;\"> </span></span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #252525; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px;\">)</span><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: xx-large; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;DOES NOT WANT SUGARY DRINKS TO BE TAXED !</b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 20.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://blogs.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/Swaminomics/tax-sugarcane-farmers-not-sugary-drinks/\">http://blogs.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/Swaminomics/tax-sugarcane-farmers-not-sugary-drinks/</a><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DSEn6JLDeBA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/DSEn6JLDeBA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you have a medical\ncondition that requires long-term antibiotics, ask your doctor if a narrow\nspectrum antibiotic (one that\u2019s specific to your infection) can replace a broad\nspectrum drug (one that kills all bacteria, good and bad).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you need to use\nantibiotics, also take probiotics (Lactobacillus acidophilus, Lactobacillus\nbifidus, saccharomyces boulardii) for at least two to three weeks after your\nantibiotic treatment is completed. They will help restore your natural\nbacterial balance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Important note: When\nyou do get a prescription for an antibiotic, always finish the whole course . &nbsp;By not doing so, the offending bacteria can\nbecome more resilient and cause problems later on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-attachment: initial; Ajit\nVadakayil</span></a></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/nutritious-a1-milk-of-vedic-cows-with.html?showComment=1410726482241#c699545090069618483\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 15,\n2014 at 1:58 AM</span></a></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: #eeeeee; background-image: initial; background-origin: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-size: initial; line-height: 200%; margin: 0in 0in 6pt 99pt;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">hi bz,<br />\n<br />\nGhee, is made from A2 humped cow milk.<br />\n<br />\nGhee has fat, 62% of which consists of good for health saturated fat.<br />\n<br />\nGhee has slightly alkalizing effect on the body whereas butter has an\nacidifying effect.<br />\n<br />\nGhee reduces bad LDL cholesterol. Ghee's ability to remove unwanted cholesterol\nfrom the arteries makes it useful in preventing heart disease.<br />\n<br />\nVirgin Coconut oil and ghee are the ONLY heathy fats.<br />\n<br />\nGhee is made by boiling raw milk and then allowing it to cool to 43\u00b0C. then\ncurd is added. After letting it set, covered at room temperature for around 12\nhours, the curd is then churned to get cultured butter. This butter is finally\nused to simmer into ghee. Ghee thus is the pure extraction of oil from butter.<br />\n<br />\nButter is made by separating cream from milk. When cream has been separated\nfrom milk, it can be churned until it reaches a semi-solid state -- butter.<br />\n<br />\nGhee has a a higher smoke point ( 260 deg C ) than butter ( 180 deg C ). Ghee\nwiill generate very few health damaging free radicals.<br />\n<br />\nHence ghee is suitable for high heat Indian cooking.<br />\n<br />\nGhee aids in digestion because it helps in the secretion of stomach acids and\nboosts brain function with its balanced ratio of omega-6 to omega-3 fatty\nacids. Ghee contains 18 amino acids that help to mobilize fat and shrink fat\ncells.<br />\n<br />\nGhee also improves memory, vision and the immune system. Ghee has anti-aging,\nanti-inflammatory properties and is considered a holy substance in 6000 year\nold Ayurveda. Ghee is rich in healthy fat-soluble vitamins A, D, E, and K,\nwhich are critical to bone, brain, heart, and immune system function.<br />\n<br />\nProperly made ghee contains no water or milk solids (as butter does), so it\ndoes not sputter, burn or pop in your saute pan.<br />\n<br />\nIf properly cooked, the ghee is supposed to last forever. According to\nAyurvedic tradition, the older the ghee, the more medicinal properties it has.<br />\n<br />\nIn my young age before going to Kalari, before sunrise -- we had to put a big\nheaped table spoon of AGED ghee in black palm jaggery coffee and gulp it down.<br />\n<br />\nPeople who are allergic to lactose / casein lactalbumin can have ghee . Ghee is\nrich in <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>butyric acid</b> </span>which is great\nfor healing the gut. Ghee stimulates the secretion of stomach acids to aid in\ndigestion, while butter can slow down the body\u2019s digestive process and sit\nheavy in the stomach.<br />\n<br />\nGhee from grass-fed cows contains the cancer-fighting fatty acid conjugated\nlinolenic acid (CLA) which aids in weight loss , preventing obesity , and it\nprevents some types of cancer ..<br />\n<br />\nGhee has anti-viral properties.<br />\n<br />\nGhee is shelf stable without refrigeration, and won\u2019t spoil like butter.<br />\n<br />\nOnly dim-wits and CHOOTS have butter.<br />\n<br />\nWhat are you ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 150%;\">The Candida colonies in\nyour gut need carbohydrates to reproduce and build their cell walls, and sugar\nis their favorite meal.&nbsp; Artificial\nsweeteners found in diet sodas will actually raise your blood sugar just as\nmuch as regular sugar.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Candida migrates from the intestinal tract into the\nbloodstream, it secretes metabolic waste products (phospholipase and\nacetaldehyde) that can adversely affect the body\u2019s metabolic, neurological,\nendocrine, and immune systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reduce alcohol and caffeine\nconsumption. &nbsp;Remember that alcohol/ wine\nis a natural result of yeast overgrowth and sugar. Grapes have natural sugars\nin them, so what the wine makers do is then dump a bunch of yeast into the\nsquished-up grapes and the yeast merrily munches on those sugars.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The byproduct\nof that yeast activity is alcohol and carbon dioxide. The carbon dioxide\nnaturally just floats away. The alcohol stays. So this is how wine becomes\nalcoholic - the yeast creates the alcohol while it digests the sugars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Candida produces\nacetaldehyde. It is able to use both alcohol and sugars &nbsp;for its energy needs and in turn produces\nacetaldehyde.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we drink alcohol,\nit is broken down in the liver where an enzyme known as alcohol dehydrogenase\nconverts it into acetaldehyde. Then another enzyme breaks it down further into\nacetate, which gives our cells energy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The problem is that the\nbody\u2019s ability to convert acetaldehyde is undermined when there is more\nacetaldehyde in your body than the enzyme you can produce. High levels of this\nchemical remain in the body and can cause a kind of poisoning which not only\ndoes physical damage but can very much distort mental perceptions and make you\nbehave like an asshole.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A majority of alcohol\u2019s\nharmful effects are due to the acetaldehyde. If you think that it is only\nalcoholics or people with a high level of toxicity who would get these effects,\nwell ask yourself if you have ever had a hangover. Hangover is the first\nobvious sign that you have acetaldehyde accumulated in the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Acetaldehyde levels\nrise much more when women take alcohol/ wine during the high estrogen phases of\nthe menstrual cycle. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A yeast infection can\nresult from the addition of yeast from bread to the naturally occurring yeast\nin a person's system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XQplIl_jeF0/VqiK_RAdH7I/AAAAAAABDhk/ib0tfiO5ogg/s1600/eco%2Bganfwdqfesh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XQplIl_jeF0/VqiK_RAdH7I/AAAAAAABDhk/ib0tfiO5ogg/s640/eco%2Bganfwdqfesh.jpg\" width=\"426\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in India immerse\nGanesha idols made of bentonite clay annually during Ganesh visarjan in our\npotable water lakes .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The benmi media, sickulars and\nwhite choots call it superstition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bentonite clay has the\nability to literally pull out Candida fungus embedded in the colon\u2014by its\nelectric charge . &nbsp;&nbsp;The clay itself is\nnot absorbed by the body ,whatever unwanted organisms that it absorbs is passed\nout in the stools.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/vanishing-lakes-rain-water-harvesting.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/vanishing-lakes-rain-water-harvesting.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is important to\nrealize that everyone has Candida already. It is a microorganism that is\nnaturally present in your gut, part of the balanced system that helps you to\ndigest food and stay fit and well. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An astounding 60% of\nthe antibiotics used in the US are in the livestock industry. Herds of cattle\nare fed antibiotics to keep mortality rates low and profit margins high.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When people talk about\nCandidiasis the illness, they are really talking about the excess growth of\nCandida.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modern diet is like\na feast for Candida, since it is a yeast that needs sugar to thrive and\nmultiply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chemical preservatives\nin processed food support Candida overgrowth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Processing destroys the\nfiber in your foods. You need fiber for a healthy digestive system, and to\nprevent imbalances from occurring in your gut like Candida. You may find that\nmany processed foods claim on the label that they contain added fiber.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nisn\u2019t really a lie, but what the labels don\u2019t tell you is that the added fiber\noften comes in the form of wood cellulose. This might sound natural, but it is\nactually refined using heat, acids and other chemicals to extract it from the\nwood. The best way to ensure you eat enough fiber is to eat plenty of fresh\nvegetables, especially raw ones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can have isabgol\nhusk power for fibre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress affects your\nbody in two ways, both of which can lead to excess Candida. One of your body\u2019s\nfirst reactions to a stressful situation is to release Cortisol, a hormone that\ndepresses your immune system and raises your blood sugar level.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Candida\nyeast feeds on the extra sugar, while your weakened immune system is powerless\nto stop it. Quickly it overpowers the balanced mixture of microorganisms in\nyour small intestine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The adrenals, the\nbody\u2019s shock absorbers, are the core of the endocrine stress response system.\nTwo of their most important hormones, adrenaline and cortisol, are responsible\nfor the fight-or-flight response. Adrenaline deals primarily with short-term\nstress while cortisol is produced as a result of both acute and long-term\nstress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolonged stress,\nwhether as a result of emotional, environmental or physical causes, is\ndisastrous for the adrenals. Initially, it results in chronically elevated\ncortisol levels, resulting in weight gain (especially around the midsection),\nblood sugar imbalances, thinning skin, muscle wasting, memory loss, high blood\npressure, dizziness, hot flashes, night sweats, excessive facial hair (women ),\nand other masculinizing tendencies ( women).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Progesterone is the\nprimary raw material for producing cortisol. When the glands are in overdrive,\nthe body will divert progesterone to the adrenals to support cortisol\nproduction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With reduced progesterone, the body may experience estrogen\ndominance, i.e. PMS, hot flashes, night sweats, migraines, fibroids, heavy\nbleeding, breast tenderness, weight gain, etc. Excessive cortisol also blocks\nprogesterone receptors, further contributing to low progesterone.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These two\nimbalances are the primary reasons why adrenal exhaustion leads to estrogen\ndominance and candida yeast.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cells which have\npossibly the highest affinity for cortisol are your white blood cells, your\nimmune cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A candida waste product\nproduces a false estrogen, which tricks the body into thinking it has produced\nadequate levels, signaling a reduction of its own estrogen.&nbsp; Similar messages can also be sent to the\nthyroid, reducing thyroxin production and initiating or worsening a hypothyroid\nproblem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen will literally feed candida growth, which is why birth\ncontrol pills and estrogen replacement therapy put women at a greater risk of\ndeveloping candida</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those with adrenal\nfatigue also tend to have more problems with leaky gut syndrome, food allergies\nand all manner of digestive and bowel problems.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately, the 85 lakh donation\nparty / quota doctor\u2019s answer to many of these common stress-related complaints is a\nprescription for antibiotics, and this may lead to or further exacerbate any\nunderlying yeast infection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nutrient-poor,\nlow-bulk, high-refined carbohydrate diets ( fast/ processed foods / transfats )\nof the west will, over a period of years, transform a healthy large intestine\ninto a lifeless pipe caked with layers of encrusted fecal matter (the site of\nconstant putrefaction, fermentation, rancidification, home for toxin-inducing\npathogenic bacteria) and an excellent environment for the proliferation of the\nmycelial tentacles of Candida.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The high-refined\ncarbohydrate diet also serves as a very desirable food for C. albicans which\nfurther entrenches it within the microscopic crevices of encrusted fecal\nmatter. The small intestine, housing a more fluid chyme, does not become so\ncaked with old fecal matter as it does with mucus. This also encourages Candida\nproliferation.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good bugs are killed by\nthe antibiotics; bad bugs are fueled by extra sugar. The gut\u2019s delicate\necosystem is thrown off and the bad bugs take over, which can result in many\nchronic illnesses <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eat foods that help\nyour good bacteria take over. Focus on fermented foods, which have good\nbacteria in them. Fiber helps to feed and nurture the good bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consume probiotics to\ntip the scales in your gut. By building up good bacteria in your gut, you help\ncounter the effects of the yeast and bad bacteria causing inflammation and\nirritation within the gut. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper fights yeats.\nOne factor that diminishes copper availability is poorly functioning adrenal\nglands.&nbsp; This may lead to low\nceruloplasmin or low metallothionein.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nCeruloplasmin and&nbsp; metallothionein\nare copper transport proteins.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With low adrenal\nactivity, copper may not be properly bound and may therefore become less\navailable to the body. Until adrenal activity improves, molds and yeasts will\nbe difficult to control.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the adrenals and\nthyoid glandular activity becomes more normal, often copper imbalance and yeast\nproblems disappear on their own without any need for specific therapy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steroid hormone therapy\nslows the adrenal glands which makes copper less biologically available. &nbsp;All can cause or aggravate chronic mold and\nyeast infections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper imbalance is\nmore prevalent in women, who also tend to have more sluggish adrenal gland\nactivity than men. Copper and estrogen levels tend to correlate with one\nanother, and women have more estrogen than men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before the menstrual\nperiod, a young woman\u2019s copper level tends to&nbsp;\nrise, and in some cases in which the sodium/potassium ratio in the\ntissues is low, copper also becomes less bioavailable before the period.&nbsp; This is a common time of the month for women\nto experience yeast infections.</span><br />\n<br />\nBelow: &nbsp;When whores have candida and herpes infection ( in Brazil etc ) they insist that you put off the lights-- AIYYYOOOOOOOOOOOOOO &nbsp;!!<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UZ91P0R64cg/VqjQL0iJSTI/AAAAAAABDh0/6fYa0NSzl0c/s1600/imagefffs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UZ91P0R64cg/VqjQL0iJSTI/AAAAAAABDh0/6fYa0NSzl0c/s640/imagefffs.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper must remain in\nbalance with zinc.&nbsp; When imbalances\noccur, one is more prone to all infections, in particular fungal and yeast\ninfections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The thyroid gland is\nextremely sensitive to copper.&nbsp; Common\nconditions associated with copper imbalance include hypothyroidism. Copper is\nclosely related to estrogen metabolism, and is required for women's fertility\nand to maintain pregnancy.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imbalance can\ncause every conceivable female organ-related difficulty such as premenstrual\nsyndrome, ovarian cysts, infertility, miscarriages, sexual dysfunctions and\nmore.&nbsp; It affects men less than women in\nthis area, but it may affect men\u2019s potency and sexual drive as well as that of\nwomen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper stimulates\nproduction of the neurotransmitters epinephrine, norepinephrine and\ndopamine.&nbsp; It is also required for\nmonoamine oxidase, an enzyme related to serotonin production.&nbsp; As a result, copper is involved deeply with\nall aspects of the central nervous system.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Copper imbalances are highly associated with most psychological,\nemotional and often neurological conditions.&nbsp;\nThese include memory loss, especially in young people, depression,\nanxiety, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Panic attacks, migraines,\nspaciness, brain fog, mind racing, insomnia, nervousness, irritability and\nothers also often involve copper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low sexual interest in\nmen is also related to copper, which interferes with zinc metabolism in many\ninstances.&nbsp; Men\u2019s sperm and fluids are\nvery rich in zinc.&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KV Unnikrishnan, was a &nbsp;RAW functionary, who leaked official secrets\nof India\u2019s role in Sri Lanka to the CIA. &nbsp;&nbsp;Here an American woman honey trapped him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BEFORE 1947 ALMOST THE ENTIRE INDIAN JUDICIARY WAS IN THE PAY ROLL OF JEW ROTHSCHILD, THE OWNER OF BRITISH INDIA COMPANY , WHO RULED INDIA.</b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The secret codes\nof&nbsp; RAW were compromised . Desh drohis abroad\nwere privy to intricate details of the secret negotiations involving New Delhi,\nColombo and LTTE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I know what these codes\nmean \u2014 as we as ship captains in SCI ships had the sealed cyber codes of the Indian\nNavy in the Captain\u2019s safe. &nbsp; Before taking command of a ship we had to compulsorily go to the Naval Command HQ in Colaba Mumbai and get briefed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those days when we went\nto Soviet states , we surrendered the sealed envelope to the Indian Navy , as Soviets\nused to seal the ship for fumigation , sending the crew to a hotel ashore. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In between they would\nopen the safe and steal the cyber codes . &nbsp;They were experts in this business of removing\nthe red sealing wax and resealing it with a duplicate punch ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Authorities began to\nsuspect a major leak in the RAW set-up when Indian negotiators were repeatedly\ndisconcerted during their talks with Sri Lankan officials, who seemed to know\nin advance details of New Delhi\u2019s discussions with the Madras-based Tamil\nrebels.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">New Delhi was also surprised that Colombo had detailed knowledge of\nclandestine arms shipments received by the insurgents and all the weapons India\nhad confiscated from the Tamil guerrillas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unnerved by the leaks\nand unsure of their source, the RAW leadership mounted a massive\ncounter-intelligence operation. It placed almost the entire senior strata of\nthe Tamil Nadu police force and other related Madras-based officials, including\nUnnikrishnan, under surveillance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For months, these officials\u2019 offices and\nhomes were bugged, their telephones were tapped and their movements monitored.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The documents,\nphotographs and other material gathered in the counter-espionage operation\nnarrowed the search to Unnikrishnan by mid-year. &nbsp;Ironically, by then his name had been\nrecommended to the Prime Minister\u2019s Office for promotion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earlier, he had\nturned down an option to join the regular cadre of the RAW, preferring to\nremain in his parent police service while on deputation to the intelligence\noutfit. By the mid-1980s, he was the RAW\u2019s top field officer in Madras\ncoordinating Sri Lankan affairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Confronted with the\nincriminating evidence, Unnikrishnan is said to have confessed his spying\nactivities. During a tenure in Colombo as the RAW\u2019s representative six years\nago, he had become friendly with an unnamed US consular official and, together\nwith him, engaged in several extra-marital affairs with unidentified women.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite these sexual escapades, he was apparently a hen-pecked husband and his\nalleged American contact knew that Unnikrishnan was mortally afraid of his\nwife.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometime in 1985, a\nwoman describing herself as a stewardess with Pan American Airways telephoned\nhim from Bombay to say that his American consular friend had told her to\ncontact him if she felt lonely.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unnikrishnan flew from Madras to Bombay and a\nliaison developed between the two. During 1985-86, she gave him complimentary\nair tickets to fly to Singapore. During those jaunts in Singapore, compromising\nphotographs of the stewardess and her loBerman were taken.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometime early last\nyear, an American official based in New Delhi flew to Madras and confronted\nUnnikrishnan with the photographs. &nbsp;The\nRAW man was trapped and is known to have agreed to cooperate with the American,\nwho later made Madras his own base of operations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Americans were\npassing on Unnikrishnan\u2019s information to Colombo for about 18 months preceding\nhis arrest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a civil servant,\nUnnikrishnan could not be sacked or demoted without an open legal hearing. But\nNew Delhi invoked Article 311 of the Indian Constitution to dispense with the\nlegal requirements on the grounds that national security was involved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Article 311(2) in The\nConstitution Of India 1949</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">(2) No such person as\naforesaid shall be dismissed or removed or reduced in rank except after an\ninquiry in which he has been informed of the charges against him and given a\nreasonable opportunity of being heard in respect of those charges Provided that\nwhere it is proposed after such inquiry, to impose upon him any such penalty,\nsuch penalty may be imposed on the basis of the evidence adduced during such\ninquiry and it shall not be necessary to give such person any opportunity of\nmaking representation on the penalty proposed: Provided further that this\nclause shall not apply<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">(a) where a person is\ndismissed or removed or reduced in rank on the ground of conduct which has led\nto his conviction on a criminal charge; or<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">(b) where the authority\nempowered to dismiss or remove a person or to reduce him in rank ins satisfied\nthat for some reason, to be recorded by that authority in writing, it is not\nreasonably practicable to hold such inquiry; or<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">(c) where the President\nor the Governor, as the case may be, is satisfied that in the interest of the\nsecurity of the State, it is not expedient to hold such inquiry<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild\u2019s Opium\nfounded Universities ( example:- Columbia University ) give scholarships to the\nchildren and kin of influential Indians , and later use them to suck out secret\ninformation or &nbsp;drive a desh drohi agenda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wolfenden confessed in his\nembassy.&nbsp; During his next visit to\nLondon, he was called to see an officer from the Secret Intelligence Service\n(SIS) who asked him to work as a double agent, leading the KGB along the garden\npath, &nbsp;but continuing to report back to\nSIS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When KGB came to know\nabout this, they arranged for a nice fall in his own bathroom, where he was\nkilled by head injury.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sex can be used in two\nways. &nbsp;&nbsp;First, it can be used as a simple\npayment for services rendered-like Cleopatra . Second, it can be used as a\nmeans to blackmail the agent like in modern espionage. &nbsp;&nbsp;The two techniques can be used in tandem. The\nelement of deception is always there.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MI5, the United\nKingdom's domestic counter intelligence agency, released a 14-page report\ndistributed to hundreds of British banks, businesses, and financial\ninstitutions, titled \"The Threat from Chinese Espionage.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The famed\nBritish security service described a wide-ranging effort to blackmail western\nbusiness people over sexual relationships. Conversely, Snowden, the infamous\nAmerican whistle-blower, confirmed that the British spy agency used honey-traps\nand other dirty manipulations against nations, hackers, terror groups,\nsuspected criminals, and arms dealers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tactics the employed include\nreleasing computer viruses, spying on journalists and diplomats, jamming phones\nand computers, and using sex to lure targets into honey traps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Public servants and\npoliticians are the main targets but the Chinese are also after the technology\nand military sector, so they target engineers, business people and scientists,\ntoo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People say they won\u2019t\nfall for it but they do. &nbsp;Executives with\na heavy travel schedule turn up in Shanghai or Beijing jet-lagged and find\nthemselves in need of affection. &nbsp;People succumb to massage sex. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the honey pot gets information by PILLOW TALK she drugs the\ncustomer and then photographs the documents in his briefcase and copy down the\nnumbers and the SMS messages in the mobile phone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nobel Prize winner\nMarconi , was a thief .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/jagadish-chandra-bose-nobel-prize-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/jagadish-chandra-bose-nobel-prize-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blackmail element\nis about making the&nbsp; compromising\npornographic material public. This will lead to moral stigmatisation of the\nperson in question and to criminal sanctions if it is proved that he had\ncontacts with foreign agencies. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\npresents a direct attack against a person\u2019s dignity, honour and reputation, (\neven stigma to future generations ) which undoubtedly causes the person to\nexperience extreme emotional distress<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kKeXVpC5YFc/Vp-LLLipQYI/AAAAAAABDbQ/k62mlMzbqTU/s1600/article-1255830-0891088F00000ee5DC-604_468x665.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-kKeXVpC5YFc/Vp-LLLipQYI/AAAAAAABDbQ/k62mlMzbqTU/s640/article-1255830-0891088F00000ee5DC-604_468x665.jpg\" width=\"450\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pamella Bordes , a Miss\nIndia 1982 was a honey pot used by politicians and arms dealers. The British lurid\nyellow taboid press, would call it &nbsp;<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">'wham, bam, thank you Pam'.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-1254490/What-Pamella-Bordes-did-From-society-girl-life-hippy-haven.html\">http://www.dailymail.co.uk/femail/article-1254490/What-Pamella-Bordes-did-From-society-girl-life-hippy-haven.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pamella's rise in\nLondon's social circuit has been nothing short of meteoric. After being crowned\nMiss India in 1982, the aspiring model arrived in New York where she is said to\nhave made contact with arms dealer Adnan Khashoggi , Sultan of Brunei and the\nEmir of Qatar - wealthy men who reportedly vied for her attention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apart from the\nembarrassed MPs, her liaisons included Prince Paul of Romania, Italian Count\nCarlo Colombotti and rock superstar Bill Wyman of The Rolling Stones.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her\nmethod of entering the dizzying London social circuit was simple: she\nadvertised herself in corporate magazines like Boardroom and Harpers &amp;\nQueen as a gourmet cook for high-tone dinner parties.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Her face was her fortune. Bad Karma caught up and he \"meal ticket\" face was re-arranged in an accident. &nbsp;At school she used to psyche her classmates by exclaiming loudly \" Yikes, I forgot to take my pill today\" &nbsp;or &nbsp;\" Oh,, i must not miss my appointment at the abortion clinic today \"</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sTB2mlcsVv8/VqBorrDVKrI/AAAAAAABDcI/Qh-KhsRq3L4/s1600/ddp1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"568\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sTB2mlcsVv8/VqBorrDVKrI/AAAAAAABDcI/Qh-KhsRq3L4/s640/ddp1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She met Khashoggi\nthrough controversial Indian god man Chandraswami, Khashoggi's one-time guru. She\nspent some months on his luxury yacht Nabila and is also known to have stayed\nin the apartment building he owns in Paris, occupied mainly by wealthy Arabs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How many of you have\nseen the GOLDEN PALACE of the Sultan of Brunei\u2014well our Pamella baby was familiar\nwith all that.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-part-two-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/04/lawrence-of-arabia-part-two-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: KALANK to Indian womenhood, Pamela Bordes.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Her mother ( an army officer's wife ) famously said </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" If I ever see her again I will whip her with my dog chain !&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women, too, have been\nhoney-trap targets. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;During the Cold War, East German intelligence\nchief Markus Wolf sent Stasi \"Romeo spies\" into West Germany to\nseduce powerful women and extract their secrets. . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">One former KGB agent\nhas said that the Soviet intelligence agency didn't ask Russian women to stand\nup for their country but asked them to \" </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian spies must\nbe briefed and made to take a psychological test on the subject of HONEY TRAPS\nand HONEY POTS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It holds a power of persuasion over even the\nsanest of minds&nbsp; .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
