font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I am the source of all the universe,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">just as I am its dissolution.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Nothing is\nhigher than I am;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Arjuna, all that exists<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is woven on me,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">like a web of pearls on thread.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;I am the\ntaste in water, Arjuna,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the light in the moon and sun,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">OM resonant in all sacred lore,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the sound in space, valor in men.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Know that nature's qualities<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">come from me-lucidity,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">passion, and dark inertia;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I am not in them, they are in me.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Vile, deluded sinners are the men<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">who fail to take refuge in me;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">their knowledge ruined by magic,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they fall prey to demonic power.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Arjuna, four types of virtuous men<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">are devoted to me:<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the tormented man, the seeker of wisdom,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the suppliant, and the sage.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Of these, the Disciplined Man of knowledge<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is set apart by his singular devotion;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I am dear to the man of knowledge,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and he is dear to me.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. They are all noble, but I regard<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Man of Knowledge to be my very self;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">self-disciplined, he holds me<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">to be the highest way.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. At the end of many births,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the man of knowledge finds refuge in me;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">he is the rare great spirit who sees<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Krishna is all that is\".<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Veiled in the magic of my discipline,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I elude most men;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">this deluded world is not aware<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">that I am unborn and immutable.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Men who know me as its inner being,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">inner divinity, and inner sacrifice<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">have disciplined their reason;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they know me at the time of death.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Eternal and\nsupreme is the infinite spirit;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">its inner self is called inherent being;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">its creative force, known as action,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is the source of creatures' existence.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Its inner\nbeing is perishable existence;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">its inner divinity is man's spirit;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I am the inner sacrifice<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">here in your body, O Best of Mortals.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Disciplined\nthrough practice,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">his reason never straying,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">meditating, one reaches<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the supreme divine spirit of man.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Invoking the infinite spirit<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">as the one eternal syllable OM,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">remembering me as he abandons his body,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">he reaches the absolute way.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Reaching me, men of great spirit<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">do not undergo rebirth,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the ephemeral realm of suffering;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they attain absolute perfection.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Beyond this unmanifest nature<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is another unmanifest existence,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">a timeless being that does not perish<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">when all creatures perish.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. It is called eternal unmanifest nature,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">what men call the highest way,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the goal from which they do not return;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">this highest realm is mine.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Without\nfaith in sacred duty,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">men fail to reach me, Arjuna;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they return to the cycle<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">of death and rebirth.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The whole\nuniverse is pervaded<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">by my unmanifest form;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">all creatures exist in me,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">but I do not exist in them.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Just as the\nwide-moving wind<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is constantly present in space,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">so all creatures exist in me;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">understand this to be so!<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;As an eon\nends, all creatures<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">fold into my nature, Arjuna;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and I create them again<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">as a new eon begins.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Gathering\nin my own nature,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">again and again I freely create<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">this whole throng of creatures,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">helpless in the force of my nature.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;These actions\ndo not bind me,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">since I remain detached<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">in all my actions, Arjuna,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">as if I stood apart from them.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. I am the universal father,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">mother, granter of all, grandfather,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">object of knowledge, purifier,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">holy syllable OM, threefold sacred lore.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. I am the way, sustainer, lord,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">witness, shelter, refuge, friend,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">source, dissolution, stability,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">treasure, and unchanging seed.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;I am heat\nthat withholds<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and sends down the rains;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I am immortality and death;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">both being and nonbeing am I.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b><b style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Whatever you do-what you take,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">what you offer, what you give,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">what penances you perform-<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">do as an offering to me, Arjuna.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">.You will be freed from the bonds of action,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">from the fruit of fortune and misfortune;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">armed with the discipline of renunciation,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">your self liberated, you will join me.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;I am\nimpartial to all creatures,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and no one is hateful or dear to me;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">but men devoted to me are in me,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and I am within them.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. If they rely on me, Arjuna,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">even men born in the womb of evil,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">realizing this are devoted to me.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">deep in the self,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;I am time\ngrown old,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">creating world destruction,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">set in motion<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">to annihilate the worlds;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">even without you, all these warriors<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">arrayed in hostile ranks<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">will cease to exist.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Therefore,\narise&nbsp;</span></b><b style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and win glory!</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Conquer your foes<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and fulfill your kingship!<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They are already&nbsp;</span></b><b style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">killed by me.</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Be just my instrument,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the archer at my side!<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;I deem most\ndisciplined<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">men of enduring discipline<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">who worship me with true faith,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">entrusting their minds to me.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Mastering\ntheir senses,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">with equanimity toward everything,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they reach me, rejoicing<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">in the welfare of all creatures.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;It is more\narduous when their reason<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">clings to my unmanifest nature;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">for men constrained by bodies,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the unmanifest way is hard to attain.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. Even if you fail in practice,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">dedicate yourself to action;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">performing actions for my sake,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">you will achieve success.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;If you are\npowerless to do<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">even this, rely on my discipline,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">be self-controlled,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and reject all fruit of action.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b><b style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;One who\nbears hate for no creature<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is friendly, compassionate, unselfish,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">free of individuality, patient,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the same in suffering and joy.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Content\nalways, disciplined,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">self-controlled, firm in his resolve,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">his mind and understanding dedicated to me,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">devoted to me, he is dear to me.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;He does not\nrejoice or hate,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">grieve or feel desire;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">relinquishing fortune and misfortune,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the man of devotion is dear to me.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The field\ncontains the great elements,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">unmanifest nature, the eleven senses,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Longing,\nhatred, happiness, suffering,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">bodily form, consciousness, resolve,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">thus is this field with its changes<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">defined in summary.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Knowledge\nmeans humility,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">sincerity, nonviolence, patience,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">honesty, reverence for one's teacher,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">purity, stability, self-restraint;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;I shall\nteach you what is to be known;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">for knowing it, one attains immortality;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">it is called the Supreme Infinite Spirit,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">beginningless, neither being nor nonbeing.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Its hands\nand feet reach everywhere;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">its head and face see in every direction;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">hearing everything, it remains<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">in the world, enveloping all.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Outside and\nwithin all creatures,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">inanimate but still animate,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">too subtle to be known,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">it is far distant, yet near.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Undivided,\nit seems divided<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">among creatures;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">understood as their sustainer,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">it devours and creates them.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Man's\nspirit is set in nature,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">experiencing the qualities born of nature;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">its attachment to the qualities causes<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">births in the wombs of good and evil.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">study of sacred lore, penance, honesty;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Nonviolence,\ntruth, absence of anger,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">disengagement, peace, loyalty,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">compassion for creatures, lack of greed,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">gentleness, modesty, reliability;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Brilliance,\npatience, resolve,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">clarity, absence of envy and of pride;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">these characterize a man<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">born with divine traits.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Hypocrisy,\narrogance, vanity,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">anger, harshness, ignorance;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">these characterize a man born with demonic traits.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The divine\ntraits lead to freedom,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">the demonic lead to bondage;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">do not despair, Arjuna;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">you were born with the divine.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Demonic men\ncannot comprehend<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">activity and rest;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">there exists no clarity,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">no morality, no truth in them.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;They say that\nthe world<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">has no truth, no basis, no god,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">that no power of mutual dependence<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is its cause, but only desire.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Mired in\nthis view, lost to themselves<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">with their meager understanding,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">these fiends contrive terrible acts<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">to destroy the world.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Subject to\ninsatiable desire,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">drunk with hypocrisy and pride,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">holding false notions from delusion,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they act with impure vows.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. In their certainty that life<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">consists in sating their desires,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they suffer immeasurable anxiety<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">that ends only with death.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Bound by a hundred fetters of hope,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">obsessed by desire and anger,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they hoard wealth in stealthy ways<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">to satisfy their desires.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Confused by\nendless thoughts,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">caught in the net of delusion,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">given to satisfying their desires,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they fall into hell's foul abyss.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Self-aggrandizing,\nstubborn,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">drunk with wealth and pride,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they sacrifice in name only,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">an hypocrisy, violating all norms.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Submitting\nto individuality, power,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">arrogance, desire, and anger,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">in their own bodies, as in others.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">men of misfortune, I cast<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">into demonic wombs<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">through cycles of rebirth.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Fallen into\na demonic womb,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">deluded in birth after birth,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">they fail to reach me, Arjuna,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and they go the lowest way.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The three\ngates of hell ( endless suffering ) <o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">that destroy the self<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">are desire, anger, and greed;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">one must relinquish all three.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Released\nthrough these three gates<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">of darkness, Arjuna,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">a man elevates the self<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and ascends to the highest way.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Honoring\ngods, priests,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">teachers, and wise men, being pure,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">honest, celibate, and nonviolent<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is called bodily penance<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Speaking\ntruth without offense,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">giving comfort,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and reciting sacred lore<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is called verbal penance.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Mental\nserenity, kindness,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">silence, self-restraint,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">and purity of being<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is called mental penance.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;This threefold\npenance<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">is lucid when men of discipline<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">perform it with deep faith,<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">without craving for reward.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">by individuality, you will be lost.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">intrinsic to your being, Arjuna;<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">even against your will you must do<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">what delusion now makes you refuse.<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As I heard this wondrous dialogue<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height:
