text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NWHBLCniLmY/VpS8NE8RdiI/AAAAAAABDPM/MwDtRXrJSyQ/s1600/occupatifffonal-hazards-22-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NWHBLCniLmY/VpS8NE8RdiI/AAAAAAABDPM/MwDtRXrJSyQ/s640/occupatifffonal-hazards-22-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-huYd-R0Na-A/VpS8ittf2KI/AAAAAAABDPU/SRE4nbrYNFY/s1600/DCI-Harch-HBOT-Fftyigure-3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-huYd-R0Na-A/VpS8ittf2KI/AAAAAAABDPU/SRE4nbrYNFY/s640/DCI-Harch-HBOT-Fftyigure-3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>The immoral Japanese deliberately stun whales\nand dolphins to catch them, using sonar.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ALL OVER THE PLANET NOBODY EATS A FLAT TAILED\nMAMMAL ( DOLPHINS/ WHALES ) AS THE FIRST VISHNU AVATAR WAS A DOLPHIN- AND IT IS\nASSOCIATED WITH HEALING 7.83 HERTZ--&nbsp; THE\nVEDIC RESONANCE - LIFTED AND PATENTED BY THE WHITE MAN AND NOWADAYS CALLED\nSCHUMANN RESONANCE.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/06/alpha-state-and-earths-heartbeat-of-783.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/06/alpha-state-and-earths-heartbeat-of-783.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mind you, it is NOT necessary that enemy\nsubmarines are close to the Indian east coast.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The SOFAR channel ( sound fixing and ranging\nchannel), or deep sound channel (DSC), is a horizontal layer of water in the\nocean centered around the depth at which the speed of sound is at a minimum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The SOFAR channel acts as a waveguide for\nsound, and low frequency sound waves within the channel may travel thousands of\nmiles before dissipating. This phenomenon is an important factor in submarine\nwarfare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the Bahamas in 2000, a DELIBERATE sonar\ntrial by US Navy of transmitters in the frequency range 3\u20138 kHz at a source\nlevel of 223\u2013235 decibels re 1 \u03bcPa (scaled to a distance of 1 m) was associated\nwith the instant beaching of seventeen whales, seven of which were found\ndead.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nMKLpAh89oQ/VpS3-k75v9I/AAAAAAABDOc/Z3hMGrTCrP8/s1600/sinus-assistewwwwd-hearing.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"444\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nMKLpAh89oQ/VpS3-k75v9I/AAAAAAABDOc/Z3hMGrTCrP8/s640/sinus-assistewwwwd-hearing.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Environmental groups who rushed to\nthe spot , recorded that some of the beached whales were bleeding from the eyes\nand ears, which they considered an indication of acoustically-induced trauma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Resulting disorientation and pain involved in\ndiving deep causes stranding of whales.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-n4tJqijYqT0/VpS3rYXbl5I/AAAAAAABDOU/D4dlyMemGBI/s1600/133338.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"291\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-n4tJqijYqT0/VpS3rYXbl5I/AAAAAAABDOU/D4dlyMemGBI/s400/133338.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is the presence of a natural phenomenon\ncalled a \"surface duct\" in the area at all times&nbsp; whales stranded.&nbsp; Within a surface duct, sound travels farther\nat the surface than at lower depths. The sonar is aimed at detecting new\ngenerations of nuclear and diesel-powered submarines that are much quieter -\nand harder to detect..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whales and dolphins are mammals comfortable\nwith 7.83 hertz ( frequency of OM mantra )&nbsp;\n. They rely on their hearing for life's most basic functions, such as\norientation and communication. Sound is how they find food, find friends, find\na mate, and find their way through the world every day.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-c3AXtnBEQ0w/VpS2zWOn2xI/AAAAAAABDOE/GzDa_0xiWzM/s1600/imag99nnes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-c3AXtnBEQ0w/VpS2zWOn2xI/AAAAAAABDOE/GzDa_0xiWzM/s400/imag99nnes.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Active sonar systems produce intense sound\nwaves that sweep the ocean like a floodlight, revealing objects in their path.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In USA the hilly billy yanks are still\nscratching their collective heads over thousand of whales / dolphins beached\nover the years.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hllBLouaf9k/VpS3Puf_XpI/AAAAAAABDOM/gQiK-vjLyYo/s1600/P-8%2Bl999arger.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"516\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-hllBLouaf9k/VpS3Puf_XpI/AAAAAAABDOM/gQiK-vjLyYo/s640/P-8%2Bl999arger.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The US navy has laid out\nunderwater&nbsp; DEW lines to get pre-warning\nof hostile submarines.&nbsp; Giant, unattended\ntransducers, powered by cables from land, would be lowered to considerable\ndepths where sound travels best.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JNle-7GOvvo/VpSzY7EyWmI/AAAAAAABDNk/GoFRUQVxRsg/s1600/Header-SAS-e143599052716403.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"331\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JNle-7GOvvo/VpSzY7EyWmI/AAAAAAABDNk/GoFRUQVxRsg/s640/Header-SAS-e143599052716403.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Some systems operate at more than 235\ndecibels, producing sound waves that can travel across tens or even hundreds of\nmiles of ocean. During testing off the California coast, noise from the Navy's\nmain low-frequency sonar system was detected across the breadth of the northern\nPacific Ocean.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By the Navy's own estimates, even 300 miles\nfrom the source, these sonic waves can retain an intensity of 140 decibels -- a\nhundred times more intense than the level known to alter the behavior of large\nwhales.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many of these beached whales have suffered\nphysical trauma, including bleeding around the brain, ears and other tissues\nand large bubbles in their organs.&nbsp; These\nsymptoms are akin to a severe case of \"the bends\" -- the illness that\ncan kill scuba divers who surface quickly from deep water.&nbsp;&nbsp; Mid-frequency sonar blasts&nbsp; drive certain whales to change their dive\npatterns in ways their bodies cannot handle, causing debilitating and even\nfatal injuries.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JVgHNDKOqdI/VpS498EGFDI/AAAAAAABDOs/RLz3e3kbRtI/s1600/skull_mo66del_sinuses.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"318\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-JVgHNDKOqdI/VpS498EGFDI/AAAAAAABDOs/RLz3e3kbRtI/s640/skull_mo66del_sinuses.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;There\nare no noise-cancelling headphones to stop the U.S. Navy\u2019s 235-decibel pressure\nwaves of unbearable pinging and metallic shrieking.&nbsp; At 200Db, the vibrations can rupture your\nlungs, and above 210 Db, the lethal noise can bore straight through your brain\nuntil it hemorrhages that delicate tissue. If you\u2019re not deaf after this\ndevastating sonar blast, you\u2019re dead. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is the real life of marine mammals\ndestroyed by the developed world Navy\u2019s all-out acoustic war on the world\u2019s\noceans. The collateral damage of this high intensity military sonar is\nshocking. But because all these millions of dying whales or dolphins are too\noften out of human sight, they\u2019re also out of mind<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aZ3VMLDf0aA/VpS11QeZHwI/AAAAAAABDNw/muSvNn7KXJM/s1600/so888nar.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"384\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aZ3VMLDf0aA/VpS11QeZHwI/AAAAAAABDNw/muSvNn7KXJM/s640/so888nar.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Whales, dolphins and other marine mammals use\nsound to navigate, to locate each other over great distances for a number of\nreasons.&nbsp; Human submarine/ underwater\nexploration technology is now drastically changing, damaging the delicate web\nof life and threatening life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Marine life is constantly dying their simple\nlives disrupted by excruciating sound caused pain , high intensity sonar alone\nused by the military can emit sounds as loud as a rocket blasting off.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Offshore oil and gas exploration also make\nintense bursts. Imagine a day in your life disrupted by excruciating sound,\nsound so loud that it paralyzes you and your ability to function. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Naval sonar disrupts feeding and other vital\nbehavior and to cause a wide range of species to panic and flee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is an acoustic holocaust.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J_zOALjQ65c/VpS2Iqt-3pI/AAAAAAABDN4/Dl-eHjnBU8U/s1600/downl999oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-J_zOALjQ65c/VpS2Iqt-3pI/AAAAAAABDN4/Dl-eHjnBU8U/s400/downl999oad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The low frequency\nactive sonar (LFA sonar) used by the US Navy to detect submarines is the\nloudest sound ever put into the seas.&nbsp;\nU.S. Navy&nbsp; paranoid about Chinese\nsubmarines is in the process of &nbsp;deploying\n&nbsp;LFA sonar across Bay of Bengal and\nIndian ocean.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At an amplitude of two hundred forty decibels,\nit is loud enough to kill whales and dolphins and has already caused mass\nstrandings and deaths in areas where U.S. and/or NATO forces have conducted\nnaval exercises.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWhen whales and dolphins panic due to sonar pulses confusing\nthem , they surface too rapidly.&nbsp; This\ncauses &nbsp;acute tissue damage from\ngas-bubble lesions, which are indicative of decompression sickness.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSupersaturated gas to nucleate which forms bubbles\n(cavitation).<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOn Chemical tankers we are masters of cavitation.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/cavitation-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/cavitation-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their surfacing\nbehavior of some species of whales who panic due to sonar pulses exert\nconsiderable physical effort to surface in a controlled ascent, rather than\nsimply floating to the surface like sperm whales. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vocalization stops at shallow depths, because\nof fear of predators or because they don't need vocalization to stay together\nat depths where there is sufficient DAYLIGHT &nbsp;to see each other.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AVOID SONAR PULSES AT\nNIGHT.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The elaborate dive patterns are necessary\nto control the diffusion of gases in the bloodstream.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AJU3xrncGk4/VpZ1I5ksbPI/AAAAAAABDSg/PwNEusvB2rY/s1600/20160113_212321.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-AJU3xrncGk4/VpZ1I5ksbPI/AAAAAAABDSg/PwNEusvB2rY/s400/20160113_212321.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
